Scoring method: number of revisions offered between 1 and 8 / 8 x 10 points. Example: for 2 quarters, calculation is: 2 x 15 / 8 = 3.75 points. The score will be awarded relative to the smallest number of revisions offered for a product. Example: Product 1 – availability of 1 revision; Product 2 – 2 revisions; Product 3 – availability of 3 revisions. Scoring: 1 x 15 / 8 = 1.88 points. The bidder can fulfil these obligations himself, or through an appropriate third‑party organization.

column3: Colectare și reciclare la sfârșitul de viață a produsului: Componenta de Mediu, Sistem de preluare a echipamentelor uzate, va fi gratuit, și va avea scopul de a direcționa aceste echipamente în vederea reutilizării lor sau a reciclării materialelor componente. Ofertantul poate îndeplini aceste obligații el însuși, sau prin intermediul unei organizații terțe adecvate. Pentru entitatea desemnată în cadrul metodologiei, propuse de ofertant în cadrul ofertei, cu colectarea a echipamentelor (ofertantul însuși sau terț cu care acesta are contract de prestări servicii) trebuie prezentată dovada autorizării de mediu pentru colectarea DEEE-uri. Se punctează doar ofertele care îndeplinesc în totalitate cerințele din descriere și verificare. Pentru ofertele care prezintă integral documentele solicitate pentru dovedirea asigurării unui sistem de preluare gratuită a echipamentelor în vederea reutilizării lor sau a reciclării materialelor componente, se acordă punctaj maxim, respectiv 10 puncte. Pentru ofertele care nu prezintă integral sau deloc documentele solicitate pentru dovedirea asigurării unui sistem de preluare gratuită echipamente în vederea reutilizării lor sau a reciclării materialelor componente, se acordă 0 puncte.
column4: Collection and recycling at the end of the product’s life: Environmental component, a system for collecting used equipment, which will be free and intended to direct these equipment towards their reuse or the recycling of component materials. The bidder may fulfil these obligations themselves or through an appropriate third‑party organization. For the entity designated in the methodology, proposed by the bidder in the offer, with the collection of the equipment (the bidder itself or a third party with which it has a service contract) proof of environmental authorization for the collection of WEEE must be presented. Only offers that fully meet the requirements in the description and verification are scored. For offers that present all requested documents proving the provision of a free collection system for equipment for reuse or recycling of component materials, the maximum score of 10 points is awarded. For offers that do not present all or any of the requested documents proving the provision of a free collection system for equipment for reuse or recycling of component materials, 0 points are awarded.

column3:
Contribuția procesului de fabricație la protecția mediului - produse care conțin o cantitate limitată de componente periculoase și cu un potențial redus de emisii periculoase la eliminare: Componenta de Mediu, Ofertantul trebuie să demonstreze utilizarea unui cadru pentru controlul substanțelor restricționate (CSR) de-a lungul lanțului de aprovizionare pentru produsele care urmează să fie furnizate.
Evaluările produselor conform CSR trebuie să acopere cel puțin următoarele domenii:
- planificarea/proiectarea produsului;
- conformitatea furnizorului;
- încercarea analitică.
CSR trebuie să descrie cel puțin substanțele restricționate în conformitate cu Directiva RoHS și, după caz, în conformitate cu Regulamentul REACH (anexa XVII), și substanțele aflate pe lista substanțelor candidate REACH.
Echipamentele livrate în cadrul contractului trebuie să conțină substanțe slab halogenate în piesele din plastic care cântăresc mai mult de 25 de grame. Pentru îndeplinirea celor 2 cerințe referitoare la substanțe restricționate, se vor acorda 7 puncte.

Notă: Ofertantul va depune declarațiile de conformitate cu CSR pentru materialele, piesele și subansamblurile relevante ale produselor care urmează să fie furnizate. Acestea pot fi sprijinite, după caz, de audituri ale furnizorilor și de încercări analitice. Produsele care dispun de o etichetă ecologică de tip I relevantă și care îndeplinesc criteriile menționate anterior vor fi considerate conforme.
column4:
Contribution of the manufacturing process to environmental protection - products that contain a limited amount of hazardous components and have a reduced potential for hazardous emissions upon disposal: Environmental Component. The Bidder must demonstrate the use of a framework for controlling restricted substances (CSR) throughout the supply chain for the products to be supplied.
Product assessments according to CSR must cover at least the following areas:
- product planning/design;
- supplier compliance;
- analytical testing.
CSR must describe at least the restricted substances in accordance with the RoHS Directive and, where applicable, in accordance with the REACH Regulation (Annex XVII), and substances on the REACH candidate list.
The equipment delivered under the contract must contain low‑halogenated substances in plastic parts weighing more than 25 grams. For meeting the two requirements regarding restricted substances, 7 points will be awarded.

Note: The Bidder will submit CSR compliance declarations for the relevant materials, parts, and sub‑assemblies of the products to be supplied. These may be supported, where appropriate, by supplier audits and analytical testing. Products that have a relevant Type I ecological label and meet the aforementioned criteria will be considered compliant.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price among the offers the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
2. Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor, conform art. 21 din contract: Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor: se puncteaza, acel termen care este situat intre minimul de 37 luni si maximul de 120 luni., Autoritatea contractanta puncteaza, acel termen care este situat intre minimul de 37 luni si maximul de 120  luni. 
Va obtine punctajul maxim garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor cu durata cea mai lunga.
Pentru alte durate se va utiliza formula:
PGTL (n) = (GTL (n) / GTL (cea mai mare)   ) x 20 puncte
Unde,     
PGTL (n)  - punctajul ofertei pentru factorul de evaluare „Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor” 
GTL (cea mai mare) – garantia tehnica a lucrarilor cea mai mare
GTL (n)- garantia tehnica a lucrarilor ofertata in cadrul ofertei al carei punctaj se calculeaza

Autoritatea contractată consideră un termen de garantie realist, acel termen situat între minimul de 36 luni și maximul de 120 luni. Nici o garantie care depășește 120  luni, nu va fi punctată suplimentar față de punctajul maxim aferent subfactorului de evaluare – 20 de puncte. Termenul de garație tehnică va fi exprimat în luni.
Orice oferta cu o garantie tehnica egala cu 36 luni va fi considerata conforma si va fi punctata cu 0 puncte, fiind cerinta minima stabilită prin caietul de sarcini. Orice oferta cu o garantie care nu respecta termenul minim de 36 luni va fi respinsa ca neconforma.
Garantia ofertata  va fi continuta de o declaratie  intocmita pe  propria raspundere a ofertantului, sub sanctiunile aplicabile faptei de fals in acte publice- conform modelului din documentatia de atribuire-. “Declaratie privind garantia tehnica ofertata”
column4:
2. Technical guarantee provided for the works, according to Art. 21 of the contract: The technical guarantee for the works is scored based on the term that falls between a minimum of 37 months and a maximum of 120 months. The contracting authority awards points for the term that is between the minimum of 37 months and the maximum of 120 months.
The maximum score is obtained for the technical guarantee with the longest duration.
For other durations, the following formula is used:
PGTL (n) = (GTL (n) / GTL (largest) ) x 20 points
Where:
PGTL (n) – the offer's score for the evaluation factor "Technical guarantee provided for the works"
GTL (largest) – the largest technical guarantee for the works
GTL (n) – the technical guarantee offered in the bid for which the score is calculated

The contracting authority considers a realistic guarantee term to be the one that is between a minimum of 36 months and a maximum of 120 months. Any guarantee exceeding 120 months will not receive additional points beyond the maximum score for the sub‑factor – 20 points. The technical guarantee period must be expressed in months.
Any offer with a technical guarantee of exactly 36 months will be considered compliant and will receive 0 points, as this is the minimum requirement established in the specifications. Any offer with a guarantee that does not meet the minimum 36‑month term will be rejected as non‑conforming.
The offered guarantee must be included in a declaration drawn up on the offeror's own responsibility, subject to the sanctions applicable for false statements in public documents – according to the model in the tender documentation – "Declaration regarding the technical guarantee offered".

3. Professional experience of the person nominated as Contract Manager/Coordinator – construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent for foreign legal entities: The professional experience of the nominated person as Contract Manager/Coordinator – construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent for foreign legal entities is evaluated based on the number of similar contracts in which the nominated person performed the same type of activities that will be required in the upcoming contract.

a) If the experience consists of involvement in 1 (one) contract, 0 points are awarded – this is the minimum requirement; failure to meet it leads to the offer being rejected as non‑conforming.

b) Involvement in 2 (two) contracts – 5 points.

c) Involvement in 3 (three) contracts – 10 points.

d) Involvement in 4 (four) contracts – 15 points.

e) Involvement in 5 (five) or more contracts – 20 points.

Relevant supporting documents that certify the specific experience must be attached, for example: job description, employment contract, recommendation, or any other documents issued or countersigned by the client, the main contractor, or the employer. The supporting documents must meet the following conditions:
1. They must be issued or countersigned by the client, the main contractor, or the employer.
2. They must clearly state the name of the nominated person and their specialization.
3. They must indicate the types of activities performed by the nominated person, demonstrating that in the mentioned similar contracts they held comparable positions/functions with responsibilities and tasks of Contract Manager/Coordinator.

By the term “similar contracts”, the contracting authority understands execution contracts or design‑and‑execution contracts concerning the modernization, extension, development, rehabilitation, or strengthening of road infrastructures, road works, and/or bridges.

General note: Simply stating the position held by the nominated person is not sufficient. To demonstrate compliance, the above requirements must be respected, specifying the types of activities provided and performed.

4. Professional experience of the person nominated as Road Design Engineer – construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent legislation in the country where the bidder is resident: The professional experience of the nominated Road Design Engineer – construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent legislation in the country where the bidder is resident is evaluated. Points are awarded for the engineer's experience in similar contracts, based on the number of contracts in which the nominated person has performed the same type of activities as those required for the future contract:
a) For experience consisting of involvement in 1 (one) contract, 0 points are awarded, representing the minimum requirement; failure to meet this results in the offer being rejected as non‑conforming.
b) For experience consisting of involvement in 2 (two) contracts, 2.5 points are awarded.
c) For experience consisting of involvement in 3 (three) contracts, 5 points are awarded.
d) For experience consisting of involvement in 4 (four) contracts, 7.5 points are awarded.
e) For experience consisting of involvement in 5 (five) or more contracts, 10 points are awarded.
A recommendation or any other equivalent document attesting to the specific experience must be attached, e.g., job description, employment contract, recommendation letter, or any other documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main service provider/contractor or the employer.
Supporting documents presented must meet the following conditions:
1. They must be issued or countersigned by the beneficiary, the main service provider/contractor, or the employer.
2. They must show the name of the nominated person and the specialization they hold.
3. They must indicate the types of activities performed by the nominated person, demonstrating that in the referenced projects they carried out the same type of activities as those to be performed under the future contract.
By the term “similar contracts”, the contracting authority means: design services (at any phase according to HG 907/2017 or equivalent for foreign bidders) for modernization and/or extension and/or arrangement and/or rehabilitation and/or consolidation of road infrastructures and/or road works and/or bridges.
General note: Merely stating the function held by the nominated person is not sufficient. To demonstrate compliance with the requirements, the above criteria must be respected, specifying the types of activities provided/executed.

5. Professional experience of the person nominated as Road Construction Engineer – a construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent legislation in the country where the bidder is resident: The professional experience of the nominated Road Construction Engineer – a construction engineer specialized in CFDP or equivalent legislation in the country where the bidder is resident is evaluated based on the number of similar contracts in which the nominated person performed the same type of activities as those to be performed under the future contract:

a) For experience consisting of involvement of the proposed person in 1 (one) contract, 0 points are awarded, representing the minimum requirement, the failure of which leads to rejection of the offer as non‑compliant.

b) For experience consisting of involvement in 2 (two) contracts, 2.5 points are awarded.

c) For experience consisting of involvement in 3 (three) contracts, 5 points are awarded.

d) For experience consisting of involvement in 4 (four) contracts, 7.5 points are awarded.

e) For experience consisting of involvement in 5 (five) or more contracts, 10 points are awarded.

A recommendation or any other equivalent document attesting the specific experience must be attached, for example: job description, employment contract, recommendation letter, or any other documents issued or countersigned by the beneficiary or the main service provider/contractor or the employer.

The supporting documents presented must meet the following conditions:
1. They must be issued or countersigned by the beneficiary, the main service provider/contractor, or the employer.
2. They must indicate the name of the nominated person and the specialization they hold.
3. They must indicate the types of activities performed by the nominated person, to demonstrate that they have carried out, in the mentioned projects, the same type of activities as those to be performed in the future contract.

By the term “similar contracts” the contracting authority understands: execution contracts or design‑and‑execution contracts concerning the modernization and/or extension and/or development and/or rehabilitation and/or reinforcement of road infrastructures and/or road works and/or bridges.

General note: Simply mentioning the function held by the nominated person is not sufficient. To demonstrate compliance with the requirements, the above conditions must be respected, specifying the types of services performed/executed.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices, the maximum allocated score is granted; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Numărul produselor originale OEM: Factorul 1: Numărul produselor originale OEM. Pondere 20%. Punctaj maxim factor: 20 puncte., Punctajul se acordă astfel:
Pentru oferta cu toate cartușele originale OEM (se consideră cantitatea totală maximă a acordului-cadru, respectiv 4.501 cartușe), se acordă punctajul maxim, respectiv 20 de puncte.
Pentru celelalte oferte punctajul Pt1[oem] se acordă astfel: 
Pt1[oem](n) = (număr de cartușe OEM ofertat/numărul total de cartușe ofertat per acord-cadru) x 20
column4:
Number of original OEM products: Factor 1: Number of original OEM products. Weight 20%. Maximum score for factor: 20 points. The score is awarded as follows:
For the offer with all original OEM cartridges (the total quantity considered is the maximum of the framework agreement, i.e., 4,501 cartridges), the maximum score, i.e., 20 points, is awarded.
For other offers the score Pt1[oem] is awarded as follows:
Pt1[oem](n) = (number of OEM cartridges offered / total number of cartridges offered per framework agreement) × 20

column3:
Durata de garanție a produsului: Factorul 2: Durata de garanție a produsului. Pondere 10%. Punctaj maxim factor: 10 puncte., Punctajul se acordă astfel:
Pentru ofertele cu garanția minimă acceptată, de 12 luni de la data recepției fără obiecții, punctajul acordat este 0 (zero) puncte.
Ofertele care conțin o perioadă de garanție a cartușelor ofertate sub 12 luni vor fi considerate neconforme.
Ofertele cu o garanție de 24 de luni de la data recepționării fără obiecții a cartușelor vor fi punctate cu maximul de puncte, respectiv 10.
Ofertele care prezintă garanție peste 24 luni nu se punctează în plus.
Pentru alte durate de garanții ofertate (intre 12 si 24 de luni), formula de calcul este după cum urmează: 
Pt2[dg](n) = (nr. luni ofertate/24 luni) x 10 puncte
column4:
Product warranty period: Factor 2: Product warranty period. Weight 10%. Maximum score for the factor: 10 points. Scoring is assigned as follows:
For offers with the minimum accepted warranty of 12 months from the date of receipt without objections, the awarded score is 0 (zero) points.
Offers that contain a warranty period for the offered cartridges under 12 months will be considered non‑conforming.
Offers with a 24‑month warranty from the date of receipt without objections for the cartridges will be scored with the maximum points, i.e., 10.
Offers that present a warranty over 24 months are not awarded additional points.
For other offered warranty durations (between 12 and 24 months), the calculation formula is as follows:
Pt2[dg](n) = (number of months offered / 24 months) × 10 points.

column3:
Reciclare: Factorul 3: Reciclare. Pondere 10%. Punctaj maxim factor: 10 puncte., Punctajul se acordă astfel:
Oferta care nu demonstrează existența unui sistem de colectare și reciclare periodică a deșeurilor tip DEEE, rezultate în urma utilizării produselor livrate de către respectivul ofertant, va fi considerată neconformă.
Oferta care conține dovada existenței unui sistem de colectare și reciclare periodică a deșeurilor tip DEEE, rezultate în urma utilizării produselor livrate de către respectivul ofertant, va fi punctată cu 0 (zero) puncte.
Oferta care conține un angajament din partea furnizorului de a colecta pe cheltuiala proprie, prin sistemul propriu de colectare și reciclare periodică a deșeurilor tip DEEE furnizate de către acesta, de la toate sediile achizitorului, pe întreaga perioadă de derulare a contractului, va fi punctată cu 10 puncte.
Eventuale alte proceduri/operațiuni privind cartușele utilizate urmare livrării de către ofertant, nu constituie avantaje suplimentare și nu vor fi punctate suplimentar.

Punctajul total al ofertelor se calculează după formula: PT = Pf + Pt1[oem] + Pt2[dg] + Pt3[r]
column4:
Recycling: Factor 3: Recycling. Weight 10%. Maximum score for factor: 10 points. The score is awarded as follows:
An offer that does not demonstrate the existence of a system for periodic collection and recycling of WEEE (DEEE) waste resulting from the use of the products delivered by the respective bidder will be considered non‑compliant.
An offer that contains evidence of the existence of a system for periodic collection and recycling of WEEE waste resulting from the use of the products delivered by the respective bidder will be scored 0 (zero) points.
An offer that contains a commitment from the supplier to collect, at its own expense, through its own system of periodic collection and recycling of the WEEE waste supplied by it, from all the purchaser’s sites, throughout the entire contract period, will be scored 10 points.
Any other procedures/operations concerning the cartridges used as a result of the supplier’s delivery do not constitute additional advantages and will not be scored additionally.

The total score of the offers is calculated according to the formula: PT = Pf + Pt1[oem] + Pt2[dg] + Pt3[r]

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

Additional warranty period for supplied products: The additional warranty period for supplied products – specified in the number of months for which warranty and support services are provided for the delivered products. The additional warranty granted to the products is scored as follows:
a) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 36 months for the offered products, 20 points are awarded; for a warranty longer than 36 months no additional points are awarded.
b) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 24 months for the offered products, 10 points are awarded.
c) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 12 months for the offered products, 0 points are awarded.
d) If the bidder provides a warranty period shorter than 12 months (the minimum warranty stipulated in these terms of reference), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Viteza de printare format A4 alb-negru/color: Componenta tehnica. Viteza de printare este exprimata in numar de pagini pe minut (ppm), a) pentru cea mai mare viteza (viteza maxima) de printare ofertata se acorda 20 puncte; b) pentru celelalte viteze ofertate punctajul PViteza de printare se calculeaza proportional, astfel: PViteza de printare = (viteza ofertata/viteza maxima ofertata) x punctaj maxim alocat (20p). c) in situatia in care ofertantul asigura pentru produsele ofertate o viteza maxima mai mica decat cea prevazuta in Caietul de sarcini, oferta va fi declarata neconforma.
column4: Printing speed for A4 format black-and-white/color: Technical component. The printing speed is expressed in number of pages per minute (ppm), a) for the highest speed (maximum speed) offered, 20 points are awarded; b) for the other offered speeds, the printing speed score is calculated proportionally as follows: PViteza de printare = (offered speed / maximum offered speed) × maximum allocated score (20 points). c) In the situation where the bidder provides for the offered products a maximum speed lower than that specified in the Terms of Reference, the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Capacitate de stocare SSD: Componenta tehnica, a) pentru cel mai mare spatiu de stocare SSD se acorda 20 puncte; b) pentru celelalte spatii de stocare SSD punctajul PStocare se calculeaza proportional, astfel: PStocare = (spatiul de stocare SSD ofertat / spatiul maxim de stocare SSD ofertat) x punctaj maxim alocat (20p); c) in situatia in care ofertantul asigura un spatiu de stocare mai mic de 256 GB (cerinta minima prevazuta in Caietul de sarcini), oferta va fi declarata neconforma.
column4: SSD storage capacity: Technical component, a) the largest SSD storage space is awarded 20 points; b) for the other SSD storage spaces the storage score is calculated proportionally as follows: StorageScore = (offered SSD storage space / maximum offered SSD storage space) × maximum allocated points (20); c) if the bidder provides a storage space smaller than 256 GB (the minimum requirement set out in the specification), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

Supplementary warranty period of the supplied products: The supplementary warranty period of the supplied products – expressed in the number of months for which warranty and support services are offered for the delivered products. The supplementary warranty granted to the products is scored as follows:
a) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 36 months for the offered products, 20 points are awarded; for a warranty longer than 36 months no additional points are awarded.
b) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 24 months for the offered products, 10 points are awarded.
c) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 12 months for the offered products, 0 points are awarded.
d) If the bidder provides a warranty period of less than 12 months (the minimum warranty stipulated in these specifications), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Viteza de printare format A4 alb-negru/color: Componenta tehnica. Viteza de printare este exprimata in numar de pagini pe minut (ppm), a) pentru cea mai mare viteza (viteza maxima) de printare ofertata se acorda 20 puncte; b) pentru celelalte viteze ofertate punctajul PViteza de printare se calculeaza proportional, astfel: PViteza de printare = (viteza ofertata/viteza maxima ofertata) x punctaj maxim alocat (20p). c) in situatia in care ofertantul asigura pentru produsele ofertate o viteza maxima mai mica decat cea prevazuta in Caietul de sarcini, oferta va fi declarata neconforma.
column4: Print speed for A4 format black‑and‑white/color: Technical component. Print speed is expressed in number of pages per minute (ppm), a) for the highest speed (maximum speed) offered, 20 points are awarded; b) for the other offered speeds, the print speed score is calculated proportionally as follows: Print speed score = (offered speed / maximum offered speed) × maximum allocated score (20 points). c) in the situation where the bidder provides for the offered products a maximum speed lower than that required in the tender specifications, the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

SSD storage capacity: Technical component, a) for the largest SSD storage space, 20 points are awarded; b) for the other SSD storage spaces, the storage score PStorage is calculated proportionally as follows: PStorage = (offered SSD storage space / maximum offered SSD storage space) × maximum allocated points (20 points); c) in the situation where the bidder provides a storage space smaller than 256 GB (the minimum requirement set out in the specifications), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Norma de poluare a
autovehiculelor (NP): Pentru identificarea normei de poluare a autovehiculului autoritatea contractanta solicita documente justificative ( carti de identitate ale capului tractor / certificat de inmatriculare), Autoritatea contractanta acorda punctaj astfel:
         1. Pentru NP – Euro 6, Hidrid, Electric – 5 pct. 
         2. Pentru NP – Euro 5 – 3 pct.
         3. Pentru NP – Euro 4 – 0 pct.
Sub norma de poluare Euro 4 – oferta se considera neconforma.
Punctajul pentru componenta tehnica se va acorda dupa urmatoarea formula:
PcT= (Pnp4 + Pnp5 + Pnp6)/ Numar de autovehicule (15)
PcT – punctaj  - componenta tehnica;
Pnp6 - punctaj aferent utilaje Euro 6, Hidrid, Electric 
Pnp5 - punctaj aferent  utilaje Euro 5
Pnp4 - punctaj aferent utilaje Euro 4
Numar de utilaje – utilajele solicitate de autoritatea contractanta in caietul de sarcini (15 buc).
Pnp4, Pnp5, Pnp6, se calculeaza inmultind numarul autovehicule cu punctajul aferent mai sus metionat.
Punctajul se calculeaza prin rotunjirea la 2 zecimale.
column4:
Vehicle emission standard (NP): To identify the vehicle's emission standard, the contracting authority requests supporting documents (identity cards of the tractor head / registration certificate). The contracting authority awards points as follows:
1. For NP – Euro 6, Hybrid, Electric – 5 points.
2. For NP – Euro 5 – 3 points.
3. For NP – Euro 4 – 0 points.
Below the Euro 4 emission standard – the offer is considered non‑conforming.
The technical component score will be awarded according to the following formula:
PcT = (Pnp4 + Pnp5 + Pnp6) / Number of vehicles (15)
PcT – score – technical component;
Pnp6 – score corresponding to Euro 6, Hybrid, Electric equipment
Pnp5 – score corresponding to Euro 5 equipment
Pnp4 – score corresponding to Euro 4 equipment
Number of equipment – the equipment requested by the contracting authority in the specification (15 units).
Pnp4, Pnp5, Pnp6 are calculated by multiplying the number of vehicles by the respective score mentioned above.
The score is calculated by rounding to two decimal places.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Factor de evaluare - Durata perioadei de garanție suplimentara Pgs: Pentru oferta cu Durata suplimentara a perioadei de garantie de minim 24 de luni se acorda punctajul maxim alocat, respectiv 10 puncte. Pentru oferta cu perioada de garantie egală cu minimul solicitat de 48 de luni se vor acorda 0 puncte. Pentru alte durate de garantie, punctajul se acorda conform algoritmului de calcul, astfel:, Pgs(n) = (Dsgn / Dsgm) x 10 puncte

Pgs(n) = punctaj pentru Durata perioadei de garantie suplimentara pentru oferta n Dsgn = Durata suplimentara a perioadei de garantie a ofertei n
Dsgm = Durata suplimentara a perioadei de garantie cea mai mare ofertata, dintre ofertele admisibile,
Durata suplimentara a perioadei de garantie a ofertei este de minim 24 luni peste perioada de 48 luni (pentru o perioada de garantie minima obligatorie).
column4:
Evaluation factor – Duration of the additional warranty period. Pgs: For an offer with an additional warranty duration of at least 24 months, the maximum allocated score of 10 points is awarded. For an offer with a warranty period equal to the minimum required 48 months, 0 points are awarded. For other warranty durations, the score is awarded according to the calculation algorithm as follows: Pgs(n) = (Dsgn / Dsgm) × 10 points.

Pgs(n) = score for the additional warranty duration for offer n.
Dsgn = additional warranty duration of offer n.
Dsgm = the greatest additional warranty duration offered among admissible offers.
The additional warranty duration of the offer must be at least 24 months above the mandatory minimum warranty period of 48 months.

column3:
Factor de evaluare - Gradul de adecvare al graficului general de realizare a investiției Pga: Gradul de adecvare al graficului general de realizare a investiției (durata, succesiunea activităților si inter-relaționarea acestora, inclusiv drumul critic, identificarea punctelor cheie de control (jaloanelor), resursele alocate pentru realizarea activităților si subactivităților în cadrul Contractului prin raportare la metodologia de executare a lucrărilor
Algoritm de calcul: Punctajul total se va aprecia în funcție de calificativele:
- „Foarte bine/ Excepțional”;
- „Bine/ adecvat”;
- „Acceptabil/Satisfăcător /Parțial relevant 
Fiecărui calificativ ii corespunde un punctaj., Punctajul pentru calificativul „Foarte bine/ Excepțional” este 10, punctajul pentru calificativul „Bine/ adecvat” este 5, iar punctajul pentru calificativul „Acceptabil/Satisfăcător /Parțial relevant este 0.
Păstrând ponderea de 10% pentru acest factor și raportul (proporționalitatea) de punctaj propus de entitatea contractantă (10-5-0), fiecare cerință, devenită subfactor de evaluare va fi punctată astfel:
column4:
Evaluation factor - Degree of adequacy of the overall investment implementation schedule Pga: Degree of adequacy of the overall investment implementation schedule (duration, sequence of activities and their interrelationship, including the critical path, identification of key control points (milestones), resources allocated for carrying out the activities and sub‑activities within the Contract in relation to the work execution methodology.
Scoring algorithm: The total score will be assessed based on the ratings:
- "Very good/Exceptional";
- "Good/Adequate";
- "Acceptable/Satisfactory/Partially relevant".
Each rating corresponds to a score: the score for "Very good/Exceptional" is 10, for "Good/Adequate" is 5, and for "Acceptable/Satisfactory/Partially relevant" is 0.
Maintaining a weight of 10% for this factor and the scoring ratio proposed by the contracting entity (10-5-0), each requirement, becoming a sub‑evaluation factor, will be scored as follows.

column3:
Factor de evaluare - Experiența profesională specifică a personalului desemnat pentru executarea contractului (Pten): Experienta profesionala a expertilor dsemnati pentru tesarea si verificarea lucrarilor in timpul executiei:
•    Manager proiect echipa proiectare= (5 pct)
•   Arhitect-sef proiect= (5pct)
•   Inginer structura= (5pct)
•   Inginer instalatii termice= (5pct)
•   Inginer instalatii electrice= (5pct)
•   Inginer instalatii sanitare= (5pct)
•   Sef santier = (5pct)
•   Manager proiect echipa executie = (5pct)
Se vor contabiliza contractele de experienta specifica prezentate in mod complet de fiecare ofertant pentru fiecare Expert Cheie pentru evaluare, prezentate in plus fata de cerintele minime incluse la experienta specifica descrisa in Caietul de Sarcini. Contractele de experienta specifica sunt numarate / contabilizate in vederea aplicarii algoritmului de calcul in corelare cu cerinta din Caietul de Sarcini.

Pentru a avea punctajul maxim (5 pct) se vor prezenta minim 8 contracte similare prezentului  contract in care au fost implicati expertii, respectiv punctajul va fi acordat astfel : 
- 1-8 contra, Pentru acest factor se va acorda punctajul Pt1 calculat astfel:
Ptn = Pte 1 + Pte 2 + Pte 3+ Pte 4+ Pte 5+ Pte 6+ Pte 7+ Pte 8, unde punctajele specifice fiecărui Expert propus pentru implementarea contractului în Oferta admisibilă aflată sub evaluare, sunt definite astfel:
Pte 1 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 1
Pte 2 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 2
Pte 3 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 3
Pte 4 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 4
Pte 5 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 5
Pte 6 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 6
Pte 7 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 7
Pte 8 = totalul de puncte cumulat pentru Expertul 8
 
Pentru valoarea lui Ptm maxima se acorda 40 de puncte

Pentru o valoare Ptn mai mica decat Ptm punctajul se stabileste astfel: Pten=(Ptn/Ptm)x40
column4:
Evaluation factor – Specific professional experience of the personnel assigned for contract execution (Pten): Professional experience of the experts appointed for testing and verification of the works during execution:
• Project manager – design team (5 points)
• Chief architect (5 points)
• Structural engineer (5 points)
• Thermal installations engineer (5 points)
• Electrical installations engineer (5 points)
• Sanitary installations engineer (5 points)
• Site manager (5 points)
• Project manager – execution team (5 points)
The specific experience contracts presented in full by each bidder for each key expert will be counted for evaluation, presented in addition to the minimum requirements included in the specific experience described in the Specification Book. The specific experience contracts are numbered / accounted for in order to apply the calculation algorithm in correlation with the requirement from the Specification Book.

To obtain the maximum score (5 points) a minimum of 8 contracts similar to the present contract in which the experts were involved must be presented, and the score will be awarded as follows:
- 1‑8 contracts, for this factor the Pt1 score is calculated as:
Ptn = Pte1 + Pte2 + Pte3 + Pte4 + Pte5 + Pte6 + Pte7 + Pte8, where the specific scores for each proposed expert for contract implementation in the admissible offer under evaluation are defined as:
Pte1 = total cumulative points for Expert 1
Pte2 = total cumulative points for Expert 2
Pte3 = total cumulative points for Expert 3
Pte4 = total cumulative points for Expert 4
Pte5 = total cumulative points for Expert 5
Pte6 = total cumulative points for Expert 6
Pte7 = total cumulative points for Expert 7
Pte8 = total cumulative points for Expert 8

For the maximum Ptm value, 40 points are awarded.

For a Ptn value lower than Ptm, the score is determined as: Pten = (Ptn / Ptm) × 40.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The maximum allocated score is given to the lowest among the prices; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
a)   Lanțul de aprovizionare: Lanțul de aprovizionare: factor de evaluare asociat prevederilor art. 187, alin (5), lit. a), din Legea nr. 98/2016 referitor la condițiile de comercializare a produselor, respectiv canale scurte de distribuție care facilitează interacțiunea dintre consumatori și producători.
Algoritm de calcul: punctaj maxim 30 puncte:
-   Pentru livrările directe fara intermediari (de la producător la consumătorul final), se acordă punctajul maxim de 30 de puncte;
-   Pentru un singur intermediar implicat în lanțul de aprovizionare (producator-un singur operator economic-consumator final)– se acordă 20 puncte.
-   Pentru mai mulți operatori economici implicat în lanțul de aprovizionare – se acordă 0 puncte.
Obs.: punctajul va fi calculat individual, pentru fiecare produs din anexa atașată la prezentul caiet de sarcini., Lanțul de aprovizionare: factor de evaluare asociat prevederilor art. 187, alin (5), lit. a), din Legea nr. 98/2016 referitor la condițiile de comercializare a produselor, respectiv canale scurte de distribuție care facilitează interacțiunea dintre consumatori și producători.
Algoritm de calcul: punctaj maxim 30 puncte:
   Pentru livrările directe fara intermediari (de la producător la consumătorul final), se acordă punctajul maxim de 30 de puncte;
   Pentru un singur intermediar implicat în lanțul de aprovizionare (producator-un singur operator economic-consumator final)– se acordă 20 puncte.
   Pentru mai mulți operatori economici implicat în lanțul de aprovizionare – se acordă 0 puncte.
Obs.: punctajul va fi calculat individual, pentru fiecare produs din anexa atașată la prezentul caiet de sarcini.
Punctajul final (Pf) pentru componenta tehnica – Lanțul de aprovizionare – va fi calculat după formula:
Pf = (pt.poz1+pt.poz.2+pt.poz.3+pt.poz.4+  ……..…+pt.poz.n)/n, unde Pf=punctaj final
Modalitatea de îndeplinire: În cadrul propunerii tehnice, ofertanții vor indica clar (prin completarea Formularului 4 anexat), pentru fiecare produs din tabel, coloana „producătorul”. Totodată, la nivelul propuneri tehnice, se vor prezenta Declaratii pe proprie raspundere referitoare la lantul de aprovizionare in cuprinsul carora vor fi specificate, pentru fiecare produs in parte, atat informatii cu privire la numele producatorului si dupa caz numele distribuitorului produsului precum si documente din care sa rezulte calitatea ofertantului în lantul de aprovizionare ex: autorizatie de producator, procesator, etc.
column4:
Supply chain: evaluation factor associated with the provisions of Article 187, paragraph (5), letter a) of Law no. 98/2016 concerning the conditions for marketing products, namely short distribution channels that facilitate interaction between consumers and producers.
Scoring algorithm: maximum of 30 points:
- For direct deliveries without intermediaries (from producer to final consumer), the maximum score of 30 points is granted;
- For a single intermediary involved in the supply chain (producer – one economic operator – final consumer) – 20 points are granted;
- For multiple economic operators involved in the supply chain – 0 points are granted.
Note: the score will be calculated individually for each product attached in the annex to these specifications.
The final technical score (Pf) for the Supply Chain component will be calculated according to the formula:
Pf = (pt.pos1 + pt.pos2 + pt.pos3 + pt.pos4 + … + pt.posn) / n, where Pf = final score.
Method of compliance: In the technical proposal, bidders must clearly indicate (by completing the attached Form 4) for each product in the table, the “producer” column. Additionally, in the technical proposal, self‑declarations concerning the supply chain must be presented, specifying for each product the producer’s name and, where applicable, the distributor’s name, together with documents proving the bidder’s status in the supply chain (e.g., producer authorization, processor certificate, etc.).

b) Use of reusable packaging:

Scoring algorithm: maximum score 15 points:
- The maximum number of points is awarded when deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content exceeding 45%.
- When deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content between 25% and 45%, 10 points are awarded.
- If deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content less than 25%, no points are awarded.

Method of fulfillment: Within the technical proposal, bidders will present supporting documents such as certificates/compliance declarations for packaging, specific procurement procedures, or a self‑declaration indicating the criteria they can meet. b) Use of reusable packaging:

Scoring algorithm: maximum score 15 points:
- The maximum number of points is awarded when deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content exceeding 45%.
- When deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content between 25% and 45%, 10 points are awarded.
- If deliveries are made in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content less than 25%, no points are awarded.

Method of fulfillment: Within the technical proposal, bidders will present supporting documents such as certificates/compliance declarations for packaging, specific procurement procedures, or a self‑declaration indicating the criteria they can meet.

column3:
c)Distanța de la locul de producție la locul de consum/mediul de transport prietenos: c)Distanța de la locul de producție la locul de consum/mediul de transport prietenos:
Algoritm de calcul: punctaj maxim 15 puncte:
Se atribuie un numar maxim de puncte pentru distanta cea mai scurtă;
Pentru restul distantelor, punctajul se acordă proportional.
P dist=dist. min/dist. ofertată x 15 puncte

Modalitatea de îndeplinire: În cadrul propunerii tehnice, ofertanții vor prezenta informatii cu privire la distanta pe care o va parcurge intre locul de productie si sediul de consum al autoritatii., c)Distanța de la locul de producție la locul de consum/mediul de transport prietenos:
Algoritm de calcul: punctaj maxim 15 puncte:
Se atribuie un numar maxim de puncte pentru distanta cea mai scurtă;
Pentru restul distantelor, punctajul se acordă proportional.
P dist=dist. min/dist. ofertată x 15 puncte

Modalitatea de îndeplinire: În cadrul propunerii tehnice, ofertanții vor prezenta informatii cu privire la distanta pe care o va parcurge intre locul de productie si sediul de consum al autoritatii.
column4:
c) Distance from the place of production to the place of consumption / friendly transport environment:
Calculation algorithm: maximum score 15 points:
A maximum number of points is assigned for the shortest distance;
For the other distances, the score is awarded proportionally.
P_dist = (dist_min / dist_offered) × 15 points.

Method of fulfillment: In the technical proposal, bidders will present information regarding the distance that will be covered between the place of production and the consumption headquarters of the authority.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated points; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

column3:
Perioada de garantie suplimentara: Garantia minima solicitata, asa cum reiese si din prevederile  caietului de sarcini, este de minim 3 ani de la receptia sistemului informatic integrat., Pentru fiecare an suplimentar de garanție fata de perioada minima de garantie solicitata in caietul de sarcini, se va acorda urmatorul punctaj: 
- oferta fara garanție suplimentara - 0 (zero) puncte; 
- 1 an perioada de garantie suplimentara - 3 puncte 
- 2 ani perioada de garantie suplimentara - 6 puncte 
- 3 ani perioada de garantie suplimentara - 10 puncte 

Dacă se ofertează o garanție suplimentară mai mare de 3 ani, punctajul acordat nu va crește peste nivelul maxim de 10 puncte;

Termenele de garantie intermediare se vor asimila punctajului inferior acordat. Spre exemplu, ofertarea unei garantii suplimentare de 6 luni va primi 0 puncte.
column4:
Additional warranty period: The minimum warranty requested, as indicated in the provisions of the tender specifications, is at least 3 years from the receipt of the integrated IT system. For each additional year of warranty beyond the minimum warranty period requested in the tender specifications, the following score will be awarded:
- offer without additional warranty – 0 (zero) points;
- 1 year additional warranty period – 3 points
- 2 years additional warranty period – 6 points
- 3 years additional warranty period – 10 points

If an additional warranty of more than 3 years is offered, the awarded score will not increase beyond the maximum level of 10 points;

Intermediate warranty periods will be assigned the lower score. For example, offering an additional warranty of 6 months will receive 0 points.

column3:
Termenul de livrare(cel mai mic termen de livrare al sistemului informatic integrat): Termenul de livrare, asa cum reiese si din prevederile  Caietului de sarcini, este de maxim 60 de zile calendaristice de la data semnarii contractului de achizitie., Punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare “termenul de livrare” exprimat in zile se acordă astfel: 
a) Pentru termenul maxim de livrare de 60 de zile se acordă 0 puncte, ofertele fiind declarate conforme.

b) Pentru cel mai scăzut termen de livrare se acordă punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare, respectiv 10 puncte;
- Termenul minim de livrare acceptat (cel mai mic) pentru care se acordă punctajul maxim de 10 puncte este de 30 de zile.
- Pentru ofertele care prevad un termen mai mic decat termenul minim acceptat, nu se acordă punctaj suplimentar (vor primi punctajul maxim alocat acestui factor de evaluare, respectiv 10 puncte).

c) Pentru ofertele cu termene de livrare între Termenul minim de livrare acceptat de 30 de zile și Termenul maxim de livrare de 60 de zile, F2(n) punctajul se calculează astfel: 

F2(n) = (Termenul de livrare minim / termen de livrare(n)) * Punctaj maxim alocat

unde:
F2(n) = Punctajul ofertei pentru factorul de evaluare „ termenul de livrare”(n); 
Termenul de livrare minim este termenul de livrare cel mai scurt din cadrul ofertelor considerate admisibile și conforme din punct de vedere tehnic și i se va acorda maximul de puncte respectiv 10 de puncte; 
Termen de livrare(n) = termenul de livrare ofertat de operatorul economic pentru care se  calculează punctajul. 
Punctaj maxim alocat = 10

Precizări/atenționări:
Termen minim de livrare acceptat (cel mai mic) pentru care se acordă punctajul maxim de 10 puncte este de 30 de zile.

Pentru ofertele care prevad un termen mai mic decat termenul minim acceptat, nu se acordă punctaj suplimentar (vor primi punctajul maxim alocat acestui factor de evaluare, respectiv 10 puncte).

Pentru ofertele cu termenele de livrare maxim acceptat (60 zile) pentru care se acordă 0 (zero) puncte - “ofertele sunt declarate conforme”.

Un termen de livrare mai mare decât cel maxim solicitat in Caietul de Sarcini va conduce la respingerea ofertei, aceasta fiind NECONFORMA.

Informatii suplimentare: 
Oferta cu punctajul total cel mai mare va fi considerată oferta câştigătoare. În cazul în care două sau mai multe oferte sunt clasate pe primul loc, cu punctaje egale, departajarea se va face având în vedere punctajul obţinut la factorii de evaluare în ordinea descrescătoare a ponderilor acestora. În situaţia în care egalitatea se menţine, autoritatea contractantă va solicita prin intermediul SEAP reofertarea, prin prezentarea unei noi propuneri financiare doar pentru ofertantii aflati in aceasta situație si oferta castigatoare va fi desemnata cea cu propunerea financiara cea mai mica (conform prevederilor art.139 alin. 3 din anexa la HG nr. 395/2016). Noua propunere financiara va fi incarcata in SEAP.
column4:
Delivery term (the shortest delivery term for the integrated IT system): The delivery term, as stated in the specifications, is a maximum of 60 calendar days from the date of signing the procurement contract. The scoring for the evaluation factor "delivery term" expressed in days is allocated as follows:

a) For the maximum delivery term of 60 days, 0 points are awarded, and the offers are declared compliant.

b) For the shortest delivery term, the maximum points allocated to the evaluation factor are awarded, i.e., 10 points;
- The accepted minimum delivery term (the shortest) for which the maximum score of 10 points is granted is 30 days.
- For offers that propose a delivery term shorter than the accepted minimum, no additional points are awarded (they will receive the maximum points for this evaluation factor, i.e., 10 points).

c) For offers with delivery terms between the accepted minimum of 30 days and the maximum of 60 days, the score F2(n) is calculated as:

F2(n) = (minimum delivery term / delivery term(n)) * maximum allocated points

where:
F2(n) = the score of the offer for the evaluation factor "delivery term" (n);
minimum delivery term = the shortest delivery term among the admissible and technically compliant offers, which receives the maximum of 10 points;
 delivery term(n) = the delivery term offered by the economic operator for which the score is being calculated.
Maximum allocated points = 10.

Notes/Warnings:
The accepted minimum delivery term for which the maximum score of 10 points is awarded is 30 days.

For offers that propose a term shorter than the accepted minimum, no extra points are awarded (they receive the maximum 10 points for this factor).

For offers with the maximum accepted delivery term (60 days) the score is 0 points – "offers are declared compliant".

A delivery term longer than the maximum requested in the specifications will lead to the offer being rejected as NON‑COMPLIANT.

Additional information:
The offer with the highest total score will be considered the winning offer. If two or more offers rank first with equal scores, the tie‑break will be based on the scores obtained for the evaluation factors in descending order of their weights. If equality persists, the contracting authority will request, via SEAP, a re‑tender for the tied bidders, requiring a new financial proposal only from those bidders; the winning offer will be the one with the lowest financial proposal (according to Art. 139 para. 3 of the annex to Government Decision no. 395/2016). The new financial proposal will be uploaded to SEAP.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest of the prices, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Componenta tehnica - Garantia Produselor: Garantia Produselor, Algoritmul de calcul
Punctaj maxim alocat est ede 10 puncte.
Punctajul se acorda astfel:
a) pentru oferta cu cel mai mare termen de garantie acordat echipamentelor, dintre toate ofertele conforme si admisibile, se acorda punctaj maxim alocat (10 pct)
b) pentru celelalte oferte conforme si admisibile (x), punctajul se calculeaza cu urmatoarea formula de calcul: Punctaj atribuit = [Tg(x) - 24] / 36 x 10
Note*
a) termenul de garantie aferent produselor trebuie sa fie minim 24 de luni, cerinta minimala impusa prin caietul de sarcini si fisele tehnice aferente produselor din cadrul caietului de sarcini.
Astfel spus orice produs care prezinta o garantie mai mica de 24 de luni va conduce la declararea propunerii tehnice ca neconforme in raport cu cerintele caietului de sarcini.
Fiind o cerinta minima pentru un termen de garantie oferit de 24 de luni se va acorda punctaj 0 (Cerinta minimala a caietului de sarcini nu se puncteaza in algoritmul de calcul aferent acestui factor de evaluare).
b) Orice termen de garantie aferent produselor ofertate, mai mare sau egala cu 60 de luni (5 ani) va primi punctajul maxim, respectiv 10 puncte. Altfel spus, orice termen de garantie oferit suplimentar peste acest prag de referinta de 60 de luni nu va aduce un punctaj suplimentar ofertei inaintate, in cadrul procesului de aplicare a factorilor de evaluare respectiv de intocmire a clasamentului final. Durata de garantie minima acceptata (sub care oferta va fi declarata neconforma) este de 24 luni, iar cea maxima 60 de luni peste care oferta nu va fi punctata suplimentar. Perioada de 24 de luni inglobeaza perioada minima de garantie impusa prin caietul de sarcini (24 de luni). Nota: pentru un termen de garantie oferit de 24 de luni se va acorda punctajul 0,00
column4: Technical component – Product Warranty: Product Warranty, scoring algorithm. Maximum allocated score is 10 points. The score is awarded as follows: a) for the offer with the longest warranty term granted to the equipment, among all compliant and admissible offers, the maximum allocated score (10 points) is awarded; b) for the other compliant and admissible offers (x), the score is calculated with the following formula: Assigned score = [Tg(x) - 24] / 36 × 10. Note: a) the warranty term for the products must be at least 24 months, the minimum requirement imposed by the tender specifications and the technical datasheets of the products within the tender documentation. Thus, any product presenting a warranty of less than 24 months will lead to the technical proposal being declared non‑compliant with the tender specifications. Because a 24‑month warranty is the minimum requirement, a score of 0 is assigned (the minimum requirement of the tender is not scored in the calculation algorithm for this evaluation factor). b) any warranty term for the offered products that is equal to or greater than 60 months (5 years) will receive the maximum score of 10 points. In other words, any warranty period offered beyond this reference threshold of 60 months will not bring additional points to the submitted offer during the evaluation factor application and final ranking process. The minimum accepted warranty duration (below which the offer will be declared non‑compliant) is 24 months, and the maximum is 60 months, beyond which the offer will not receive extra points. The 24‑month period encompasses the minimum warranty period imposed by the tender specifications (24 months). Note: for a warranty term of 24 months the score awarded is 0.00.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
2.1 Timp de răspuns și intervenție Tn pentru răspândirea materialelor antiderapante pentru combaterea poleiului NIVEL 1: 2.1 Timp de răspuns și intervenție Tn pentru răspândirea materialelor antiderapante pentru combaterea poleiului NIVEL 1, a) Se acorda punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare pentru oferta admisibila care ofera timpul cel mai scurt de raspuns si de interventie,
b) Pentru restul ofertelor punctajul se acordă potrivit formulei: T(n) = ( T_ min / T_of) x 10 puncte 
unde: 
T_ min = timpul cel mai scurt de raspuns si de interventie ofertat 
T_ of = timpul de raspuns si de interventie ofertat
Ofertele care vor prezenta timp de raspuns si interventie mai mare decat cel prevazut in caietul de sarcini vor fi declarate neconforme
column4:
2.1 Response and intervention time Tn for the spreading of anti‑slip material to combat icing LEVEL 1: 2.1 Response and intervention time Tn for the spreading of anti‑slip material to combat icing LEVEL 1, a) The maximum score allocated to the evaluation factor is awarded to the admissible tender that offers the shortest response and intervention time,
b) For the remaining tenders the score is awarded according to the formula: T(n) = (T_min / T_of) x 10 points 
where: 
T_min = the shortest response and intervention time offered 
T_of = the response and intervention time offered
Tenders that present a response and intervention time longer than that provided in the tender specifications will be declared non‑compliant.

column3:
2.2. Timp de raspuns si interventie Tn pentru Deszăpezirea drumurilor pe o bandă de circulație pe sens – NIVEL 1: 2.2. Timp de raspuns si interventie Tn pentru Deszăpezirea drumurilor pe o bandă de circulație pe sens – NIVEL 1, a) Se acorda punctajul maxim alocat factorului de evaluare pentru oferta admisibila care ofera timpul cel mai scurt de raspuns si de interventie,
b) Pentru restul ofertelor punctajul se acordă potrivit formulei: T(n) = ( T_ min / T_of) x 10 puncte 
unde: 
T_ min = timpul cel mai scurt de raspuns si de interventie ofertat 
T_ of = timpul de raspuns si de interventie ofertat
Ofertele care vor prezenta timp de raspuns si interventie mai mare decat cel prevazut in caietul de sarcini vor fi declarate neconforme
column4:
2.2. Response and intervention time for snow removal on a traffic lane in one direction – LEVEL 1: 2.2. Response and intervention time for snow removal on a traffic lane in one direction – LEVEL 1, a) Maximum points are awarded for the evaluation factor to the admissible offer that provides the shortest response and intervention time,
b) For the remaining offers, points are awarded according to the formula: T(n) = (T_min / T_of) x 10 points
where:
T_min = the shortest response and intervention time offered
T_of = the response and intervention time offered
Offers that present a response and intervention time longer than that provided in the specifications will be declared non‑compliant.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, Points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices, the maximum allocated points are awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the points P(n) are calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

column3:
Performanța energetică a monitorului în modul activ: Componenta verde, Se va acorda punctaj monitoarelor ofertate pentru performanța energetică a monitorului în modul activ, după urmatoarea formulă:
Punctaj oferta analizată=(Cel mai mic consum ofertat)/(Consum ofertat analizat )  x 20,
unde:
- consumul ofertat analizat reprezintă consumul specific al produsului analizat ,
- cel mai mic consum ofertat. reprezintă cel mai mic consum dintre toate ofertele primite
Ofertei cu consumul cel mai mic i se va atribui punctajul maxim (20 de puncte).
column4:
Energy performance of the monitor in active mode: Green component, the offered monitors will be awarded points for the energy performance of the monitor in active mode, according to the following formula:
Score of the analyzed offer = (Lowest offered consumption) / (Analyzed offered consumption) × 20,
where:
- the analyzed offered consumption represents the specific consumption of the product being analyzed,
- the lowest offered consumption represents the lowest consumption among all received offers.
The offer with the lowest consumption will be assigned the maximum score (20 points).

column3:
Consum de energie în stare de veghe și inactiv: Componenta verde, Se va acorda punctaj monitoarelor ofertate pentru criteriul consum de energie în stare de veghe și inactiv, dupa urmatoarea formula:
Punctaj oferta analizată=(Cel mai mic consum ofertat (veghe/inactiv))/(Consum ofertat analizat (veghe/inactiv))  x 20,
unde: 
- consumul ofertat analizat reprezintă consumul specific al produsului analizat ;
- cel mai mic consum ofertat reprezintă cel mai mic consum dintre toate ofertele primite.
Ofertei cu consumul cel mai mic i se va atribui punctajul maxim (20 de puncte).
column4:
Energy consumption in standby and inactive mode: Green component. Points will be awarded to the offered monitors for the criterion of energy consumption in standby and inactive mode, according to the following formula:
Score of the analyzed offer = (The lowest offered consumption (standby/inactive)) / (The consumption offered by the analyzed offer (standby/inactive)) × 20,
where:
- the consumption offered by the analyzed offer represents the specific consumption of the product being analyzed;
- the lowest offered consumption represents the lowest consumption among all received offers.
The offer with the lowest consumption will be awarded the maximum score (20 points).

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

column8:
1 Storage capacity of interactive board: Technical component. For the evaluation factor "Storage capacity of interactive board" points are awarded between 0 and 15 as follows:
The interactive board must have a minimum storage capacity of 64 GB – compliance requirement.
Calculation algorithm:
a) For the highest offered storage capacity, the maximum score of 15 points – 15% is awarded;
b) For a storage capacity lower than that indicated in point a) but higher than 64 GB (the minimum specified in the specifications), points are awarded as follows:
- PC(n) = (C(n)/Cmax) x 15 points.
PC(n) – Points allocated to the evaluation factor
C(n) – Offered storage capacity of the interactive board
Cmax – Maximum offered storage capacity of the interactive board
c) If a storage capacity lower than the minimum 64 GB stipulated in the specifications is offered, the offer will be rejected as non‑compliant.
column9:
1 Capacitatea de stocare tablă interactivă: Componenta tehnică, Pentru factorul de evaluare ”Capacitatea de stocare Tablă interactivă” se acordă între 0 ÷ 15 puncte, astfel:
Tabla interactivă va avea o capacitate de stocare de min. 64 GB – cerinta de conformitate.
Algoritm de calcul:
a) Pentru cea mai mare Capacitate de stocare ofertată, se acordă punctajul maxim de 15 puncte – 15%;
b) Pentru o Capacitate de stocare mai mică decât cea prevăzută la pct a), dar mai mare 64 GB (min. prevăzut in caietul de sarcini), punctajul se acordă astfel:
- PC(n) = (C(n)/Cmax) x 15 puncte.
PC(n) – Punctaj alocat factorului de evaluare
C(n) – Capacitatea de stocare Tablă interactivă, ofertată
Cmax – Capacitatea de stocare Tablă interactivă, maxim ofertată
c) În cazul în care se ofertează o Capacitate de stocare mai mică decât memoria minimă de 64 GB așa cum este prevăzut în Caietul de sarcini, oferta va fi respinsă ca neconformă.

column3:
2 Memorie RAM tablă interactivă: Componenta tehnică, Pentru factorul de evaluare ”Memorie RAM Tablă interactivă” se acordă între 0 ÷ 15 puncte, astfel:
Tabla interactivă va avea o memorie internă de min. 8 GB.
Algoritm de calcul:
a) Pentru cea mai mare Memorie RAM ofertată, se acordă punctajul maxim de 15 puncte – 15%;
b) Pentru o Memorie RAM mai mică decât cea prevăzută la pct a), dar mai mare 8 GB (min. prevăzut in caietul de sarcini), punctajul se acordă astfel:
PM(n) = (M(n)/Mmax) x 15 puncte.
PM(n) – Punctaj alocat factorului de evaluare
M(n) – Memorie RAM Tablă interactivă, ofertată
Mmax – Memorie RAM Tablă interactivă, maxim ofertată
c) În cazul în care se ofertează o memorie RAM mai mică decât memoria minimă de 8 GB așa cum este prevăzut în Caietul de sarcini, oferta va fi respinsă ca neconformă.
column4:
2 RAM memory for interactive board: Technical component. For the evaluation factor "RAM Memory Interactive Board" a score between 0 and 15 points is awarded as follows:
The interactive board must have a minimum internal memory of 8 GB.
Scoring algorithm:
a) For the largest offered RAM memory, the maximum score of 15 points – 15% – is awarded;
b) For a RAM memory smaller than that specified in point a) but larger than 8 GB (the minimum specified in the tender specifications), the score is awarded as follows:
PM(n) = (M(n)/Mmax) x 15 points.
PM(n) – Score allocated to the evaluation factor
M(n) – Offered RAM memory of the interactive board
Mmax – Maximum RAM memory of the interactive board offered
c) In the case that a RAM memory smaller than the minimum 8 GB specified in the tender specifications is offered, the bid will be rejected as non‑conforming.

column3:
3.Perioadele de garanție extinse
Se aplica pentru: 
 Tabla interactiva cu suport
Sistem desktop
Laptop
Sistem All in One
Sistem de sunet
Multifunctionala
Camera videoconferinta
Router wifi
Scanner documente portabil: Componenta tehnică, Componenta tehnică cu o pondere de 20% și un punctaj maxim a factorului: 20 pct.
Algoritm de calcul: 
Punctajul se acorda  in functie de perioada de garantie acordata pentru aceasta perioada astfel:
     Se acorda punctajul maxim de 20 puncte, ofertei/ofertelor care prezinta cel mai mare termen de garantie, respectiv 60 luni
     Pentru restul ofertelor punctajul se acorda potrivit formulei : PGn=(Gn/60)x20 unde:
PGn – punctajul obtinut de catre oferta admisibila aflata sub evaluare
Gn – garantia in luni acordata in cadrul ofertei admisibile aflate sub evaluare
Pentru cerinta minima din caietul de sarcini, privind garantia produselor respectiv 24 luni, nu se acorda punctaj, oferta fiind declarata conforma.
Ofertele care prezinta un termen de garantie mai mic de 24 luni, vor fi considerate neconforme.
Durata maxima a garantiei peste care oferta nu va fi punctata suplimentar este de 60 luni.
Termenul de garantie va fi exprimat in luni.
column4:
3. Extended warranty periods
Applies to:
 Interactive board with support
 Desktop system
 Laptop
 All‑in‑One system
 Sound system
 Multifunction printer
 Video‑conference camera
 Wi‑Fi router
 Portable document scanner: Technical component, Technical component with a weight of 20 % and a maximum score factor of 20 points.
Scoring algorithm:
The score is awarded based on the warranty period offered as follows:
    The maximum score of 20 points is awarded to the offer(s) that present the longest warranty term, i.e., 60 months.
    For the remaining offers the score is awarded according to the formula: PGn = (Gn/60) × 20 where:
PGn – the score obtained by the admissible offer under evaluation
Gn – the warranty in months granted in the admissible offer under evaluation.
For the minimum requirement in the specifications regarding product warranty, i.e., 24 months, no score is awarded; the offer is declared compliant.
Offers presenting a warranty term less than 24 months will be considered non‑compliant.
The maximum warranty duration beyond which the offer will not receive additional points is 60 months.
The warranty term shall be expressed in months.

column3:
4. Ambalaj din material reciclat si reciclabil: Componenta tehnică, Componenta tehnică cu o pondere de 10% și un punctaj maxim a factorului: 10 pct.
Se aplica pentru toate produsele ofertate
Algoritm de calcul: 
Se acorda 10  puncte, ofertei/ofertelor care prezintă pentru cutiile din carton, pungile sau foliile din plastic utilizate pentru ambalarea finală material reciclat si reciclabil in proportie de 100% în conformitate cu definițiile prevăzute în EN 13430.
column4:
4. Packaging made of recycled and recyclable material: Technical component, Technical component with a weight of 10% and a maximum factor score of 10 points.
Applies to all offered products.
Calculation algorithm:
10 points are awarded to the offer(s) that present, for cardboard boxes, bags or plastic films used for final packaging, recycled and recyclable material in a proportion of 100% in accordance with the definitions provided in EN 13430.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The maximum allocated points are awarded for the lowest price; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

Extended guarantee of works: Evaluation factor "Extended guarantee of works" – weight 20%, maximum score 10 points.
The score for this factor (10 out of 100 total points, 10% weight) is allocated as follows:
The warranty period is extended by adding months to the minimum guarantee period, which according to Law no. 10/1995 is at least 60 months for Category B importance constructions. The technical guarantee term offered (in months) will be scored between a minimum of 61 months and a maximum of 96 months. Any technical guarantee below 60 months will be rejected as non‑compliant. An offer with a 60‑month guarantee is considered compliant and receives the minimum admissible score of 0.01 points. The longest guarantee offered receives the maximum score (10 points). For other offers the score is calculated proportionally: Go(n) = (Gn / Gmax offered) × 10, where Go(n) is the score of the analyzed offer, Gn is the guarantee period in the offer (months), and Gmax offered is the highest guarantee period proposed (months).
To avoid a purely declarative approach, bidders must, in the technical proposal, describe the qualitative advantages of the works (material quality and durability, advanced technologies, etc.) that justify the extended guarantee, explain how the quality‑management plan will ensure the required quality level of results and processes, and provide detailed methodology for the contract activities, including detailed work methods for major components and the materials to be used, so that the extended guarantee can be demonstrated. The benefit obtained by the beneficiary from a guarantee period exceeding the minimum will be preserved during contract implementation.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest of the prices, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

Additional warranty period for supplied products: The additional warranty period for supplied products – expressed in the number of months for which warranty and support services are offered for the delivered products. The additional warranty granted to the products is scored as follows:
a) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 36 months for the offered products, 20 points are awarded; for a warranty longer than 36 months no additional points are given.
b) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 24 months for the offered products, 10 points are awarded.
c) If the bidder provides a warranty period of 12 months for the offered products, 0 points are awarded.
d) If the bidder provides a warranty period less than 12 months (the minimum warranty stipulated in these specifications), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices, the maximum allocated points are awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the points P(n) are calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

Total SSD storage space: Technical component. a) For the largest SSD storage space, 20 points are awarded; b) For the other SSD storage spaces, the storage score (PStocare) is calculated proportionally as follows: PStocare = (offered SSD storage space / maximum offered SSD storage space) × maximum allocated points (20p); c) In the situation where the bidder provides a storage space smaller than 256 GB (the minimum requirement set out in the specifications), the offer will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
