column4: Price of the offer: Financial component, Points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices the maximum allocated points are awarded; b) For the other offered prices the points P(n) are calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated points.

column3:
F2, costul energiei: Se va prezenta IN CADRUL OFERTEI TEHNICE, CAPITOL 9, soluțiile tehnice propuse pentru optimizarea CONSUMULUI de energie
• Electrice
• Gaze naturale
pentru
- Încălzire
- Apă caldă
- Ventilare, climatizare
- Iluminat interior.
Se va prezenta calcule energetice pentru energie electrică și GN, respectând metode, factori de conversie și calcule din Metodologie de calcul al performanței energetice a clădirilor, indicativ Mc 001-2022.
Se va calcula consumul total de energie electrică (energie finală), exprimat în MWh/an.
Se va calcula consumul total de gaze naturale (energie finală), exprimat în MWh/an.
Factori de conversie:
- Energie electrică: 1300 lei/MWh,
- Energie GN: 700 lei/MWh.
Valoare F3 se va calcula astfel:
F3 = (Consum energie electrică MWh/an * 1300 lei/MWh) + (Consum energie GN MWh/an * 700 lei/MWh), rotunjit la 2 zecimale., Costul energiei electrice și al gazului natural,
20% * 100 puncte * (cel mai mic cost ofertat/costul justificat din oferta)
Pondere factor: 20%.
column4:
F2, energy cost: In the TECHNICAL OFFER, CHAPTER 9, the technical solutions proposed for optimizing ENERGY consumption shall be presented:
- Electricity
- Natural gas
for:
- Heating
- Hot water
- Ventilation, air conditioning
- Interior lighting.
Energy calculations for electricity and NG shall be presented, respecting methods, conversion factors and calculations from the Methodology for calculating the energy performance of buildings, reference Mc 001-2022.
The total electricity consumption (final energy) shall be calculated, expressed in MWh/year.
The total natural gas consumption (final energy) shall be calculated, expressed in MWh/year.
Conversion factors:
- Electricity: 1300 lei/MWh,
- NG energy: 700 lei/MWh.
Value F3 shall be calculated as follows:
F3 = (Electricity energy consumption MWh/year * 1300 lei/MWh) + (NG energy consumption MWh/year * 700 lei/MWh), rounded to 2 decimals., the cost of electricity and natural gas,
20% * 100 points * (lowest offered cost / justified cost in the offer)
Factor weight: 20%.

column3:
F3, emisie de CO2: Pentru soluții tehnice prezentate pentru F3, mai sus, se va prezenta IN CADRUL OFERTEI TEHNICE, CAPITOL 9, calcule privind emisie de CO2, respectând metode, factori de conversie și calcule din Metodologie de calcul al performanței energetice a clădirilor, indicativ Mc 001-2022.
Emisie de CO2 se va exprima în tone/an, rotunjit la 2 zecimale., Conform Art. 187, alin. (4^1), alin. (8), lit. c) se va introduce un factor de mediu, și anume emise de gaze cu efect de seră, mai exact emisei de CO2 în tone CO2/an.
20% * 100 puncte * (cel mai mic GHG ofertat/GHG din oferta)
Pondere factor: 20%.
column4: F3, CO2 emissions: For the technical solutions presented for F3, above, within the TECHNICAL OFFER, CHAPTER 9, calculations regarding CO2 emissions shall be presented, respecting the methods, conversion factors and calculations from the Methodology for calculating the energy performance of buildings, reference Mc 001-2022. CO2 emissions shall be expressed in tonnes per year, rounded to 2 decimals. According to Art. 187, paragraph (4^1), paragraph (8), letter c) an environmental factor shall be introduced, namely greenhouse gas emissions, specifically CO2 emissions in tonnes CO2 per year. 20% * 100 points * (the lowest GHG offered / GHG in the offer) Factor weight: 20%.

column3:
F4, contract colectiv de muncă: Documente justificative pentru F4, prezentate IN CADRUL OFERTEI TEHNICE, CAPITOL 10: se va prezenta separat, cu explicație detaliată, defalcată pe ofertant, membru asocierii. Documente justificative: contract colectiv, documente sindicale, alte documente specifice doveditoare., Conform Art. 187, alin. (5), lit. d) se va introduce un factor social, și anume, dacă pentru partea de EXECUȚIE DE LUCRĂRI.
Valoare alocată:
- cel puțin unul dintre membrii asocierii, având o pondere din valoarea ofertei de minim 50%, deține contract colectiv de muncă încheiat cu o organizaţie sindicală sau îi este aplicabil un contract colectiv de muncă la nivel de sector de negociere colectivă – 50 puncte;
- ofertantul unic, sau fiecare membru al asocierii deține contract colectiv de muncă încheiat cu o organizaţie sindicală sau îi este aplicabil un contract colectiv de muncă la nivel de sector de negociere colectivă – 100 puncte;
- alte situații – 0 punct.
10% * punctaj aplicabil
Ponderea factor: 10%.
column4:
F4, collective labor contract: Supporting documents for F4, to be presented WITHIN THE TECHNICAL OFFER, CHAPTER 10: they must be presented separately, with detailed explanation, broken down by bidder, member of the association. Supporting documents: collective contract, union documents, other specific proof documents. According to Art. 187, paragraph (5), letter d) a social factor must be introduced, namely, for the EXECUTION OF WORKS part.
Allocated value:
- at least one of the association members, holding at least 50% of the offer value, has a collective labor contract concluded with a trade union organization or is subject to a collective labor contract at the sectoral collective bargaining level – 50 points;
- the sole bidder, or each member of the association, holds a collective labor contract concluded with a trade union organization or is subject to a collective labor contract at the sectoral collective bargaining level – 100 points;
- other situations – 0 points.
10% * applicable score
Factor weight: 10%.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

column3:
Componenta tehnica: Demonstrarea unei metodologii adecvate de implementare a contractului, precum si o planificare adecvata a resurselor umane si a activitatilor:
-Abordarea propusa pentru implementarea contractului, Informatiile analizate sunt cele din formularul propunere tehnica, capitolul II, III, V-XVII.
Rationamentul utilizat in evaluarea continutului este conform Caiet de sarcini.
Punctaj : Foarte bine - 10 puncte
                Bine             -   5 puncte
                 Acceptabil -   2,5 puncte
Lipsa acestei sectiuni conduce la declararea ofertei ca neconforme si nu se acorda punctaj.
column4:
Technical component: Demonstration of an appropriate methodology for implementing the contract, as well as adequate planning of human resources and activities:
- The proposed approach for contract implementation, the information analyzed are those from the technical proposal form, chapters II, III, V-XVII.
The reasoning used in evaluating the content is in accordance with the Terms of Reference.
Scoring: Very good – 10 points
          Good – 5 points
          Acceptable – 2.5 points
The absence of this section leads to the offer being declared non‑compliant and no points are awarded.

Technical component: Demonstrating an appropriate methodology for implementing the contract, as well as adequate planning of human resources and activities: - Gantt chart, the information analyzed is that from the technical proposal form, chapters II, III and IV.
The reasoning used in evaluating the content is in accordance with the Terms of Reference.
Scoring: Very good – 10 points; Good – 5 points; Acceptable – 2.5 points. Absence of this section leads to the offer being declared non‑conforming and no score being awarded.

c)   Experience of the experts involved: project manager (design team coordinator), a. for experience consisting of having held a similar position (project manager/coordinator/director) in 2-4 contracts that involve the design of works similar to those in the specifications (i.e., design phases SF, DALI, PT for construction/modernisation/rehabilitation of roads and bridges, including national roads, express roads, motorways, with works such as building/rehabilitating/modernising bridges, footbridges, viaducts). The proposed person receives 1 point out of the maximum points allocated to that expert.

b. for experience consisting of having held a similar position (project manager/coordinator/director) in 5-7 contracts that involve the design of works similar to those in the specifications (same design phases and types of infrastructure). The proposed person receives 3 points out of the maximum points allocated to that expert.

c. for experience consisting of having held a similar position (project manager/coordinator/director) in 8 or more contracts that involve the design of works similar to those in the specifications (same design phases and types of infrastructure). The proposed person receives 5 points out of the maximum points allocated to that expert. No points are awarded for involvement in only one contract. The offer is declared non‑conforming if there is no proof of the expert’s involvement in a contract that included design of construction/rehabilitation/modernisation of bridges, footbridges, viaducts related to national, express, or motorway roads. To demonstrate experience, the following must be submitted: • a current CV, signed and dated at the time of the offer, showing the main projects and the position held; • copies "as true to the original" of diplomas or equivalent documents issued by Romanian state‑recognised educational institutions or equivalents for citizens of other EU member states, as mentioned in the CV; • copies "as true to the original" of employment contracts/collaboration/service contracts and/or participation commitments (for personnel not employed by the bidder); • relevant documents (recommendations from final beneficiaries, performance verification reports, etc.) confirming the statements in the CV.

- Graduate of technical university studies with a licence/degree in the CFDP specialization – minimum 5 years of experience.

Experience of the experts involved: Road Design Engineer, a. for experience consisting of having performed a similar position (road design engineer) in 2-4 contracts that involve designing works similar to those described in the specification (i.e., design phases SF, DALI, PT for construction / modernization / rehabilitation of roads, namely national roads, express roads, highways); the proposed person receives 1 point out of the maximum points allocated to that expert.
b. for experience consisting of having performed a similar position (road design engineer) in 5-7 contracts that involve designing works similar to those described in the specification (i.e., design phases SF, DALI, PT for construction / modernization / rehabilitation of roads, namely national roads, express roads, highways); the proposed person receives 3 points out of the maximum points allocated to that expert.
c. for experience consisting of having performed a similar position (road design engineer) in 8 or more contracts that involve designing works similar to those described in the specification (i.e., design phases SF, DALI, PT for construction / modernization / rehabilitation of roads, namely national roads, express roads, highways); the proposed person receives 5 points out of the maximum points allocated to that expert.
To demonstrate experience, the following shall be submitted without limitation:
- a current signed and dated curriculum vitae at the time of bid submission, covering the main projects in which the candidate was involved and the position held in each;
- copies "as per original" of diplomas obtained or other equivalent documents issued by institutions recognized by the Romanian state or equivalents for citizens of other EU Member States, as listed in the CV;
- copies "as per original" of employment contracts / collaboration contracts / service contracts and/or participation commitments (for personnel not employed by the bidder);
- relevant documents (recommendations from final beneficiaries, reception minutes, etc.) confirming/demonstrating the statements in the CV.
No points are awarded for the expert's involvement in a single contract.
The offer is declared non‑conforming if proof of the expert’s involvement in a contract where road construction / rehabilitation / modernization works (national roads, express roads, highways) were designed is not provided.
- Graduate of technical university studies with a bachelor's degree or equivalent in Railway, Roads and Bridges or an equivalent field.
- Minimum 5 years of experience.

Expert experience – involvement: Technical responsible for the execution of civil works. For experience consisting of having held a similar position (technical responsible for the execution of civil works) in 2‑4 contracts that involve works similar to those described in the specifications for construction / modernization / rehabilitation of bridges on national roads, express roads or motorways, the proposed person receives 1 point out of the maximum points allocated to that expert. For experience consisting of having held a similar position in 5‑7 such contracts, the person receives 3 points. For experience consisting of having held a similar position in 8 or more such contracts, the person receives 5 points. To award points, the bidder must present recommendations issued by the final beneficiary or the expert’s register. Note: No points are awarded for involvement in only one contract. The offer is declared non‑conforming if proof of the expert’s involvement in a contract that included construction/rehabilitation/modernization of bridges on national roads, express roads or motorways is not provided. To demonstrate experience, the bidder must submit, without limitation: • a current signed and dated curriculum vitae indicating the main projects and the position held; • copies “as per original” of diplomas or equivalent documents issued by recognized Romanian or EU‑member‑state educational institutions; • copies “as per original” of employment or collaboration contracts or participation commitments (for personnel not employed by the bidder); • relevant documents (recommendations from final beneficiaries, acceptance protocols, etc.) confirming the information in the CV. • A university degree in a technical field (construction or equivalent); • MLDAP certificate; • Minimum 5 years of experience.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The maximum allocated score is given for the lowest price; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Perioada de garanție a lucrărilor: Perioada de garanție a lucrărilor, Pentru ofertele care prezintă o perioadă de garanție a lucrărilor de 60 de luni se va acorda punctajul maxim, respectiv 25 puncte.
Pentru ofertarea unei perioade de garanție minimă de 36 de luni se acordă 1 punct.
Ofertele cu perioada de garanție a lucrărilor mai mică de 36 de luni sunt declarate neconforme.
Se acorda punctaj intermediar pentru intervalul cuprins între 37 luni (inclusiv) și 59 luni (inclusiv) cate 1 punct pentru fiecare lună acordată suplimentar.
Nu se acorda punctaj intermediar pentru intervale mai mici de 1 lună.
Nota 1: Pentru ofertele care prezintă perioada de garanţie a lucrărilor exprimată în număr de zile sau dacă numărul de luni prezentat este sub formă de zecimale se va lua în considerare doar numărul întreg de luni. (ex 1: 1.404 de zile = 1.404 zile / 30 zile = 46,80 luni - se punctează 46 de luni; ex. 2: 38,2 luni se punctează 38 de luni).
Nota 2: Ofertantul își va demonstra cele declarate în ofertă referitor la perioada de garanție prin specificarea materialelor și tehnologiilor pe care le va utiliza și pe care le consideră ca pot asigura calitatea necesară.
Prin propunerea tehnică ofertantul va descrie modul în care planul de management al calității va asigura nivelul necesar de calitate al rezultatelor sale și al procesele de lucru, prin prezentarea abordării generale și metodologiei pentru realizarea activităților din cadrul contractului, inclusiv descrieri detaliate ale metodelor de lucru pentru componentele majore ale lucrărilor precum și materialele pe care le va pune în operă, astfel încât ofertarea unei garanții extinse a lucrărilor să nu se facă doar la nivel declarativ în vederea obținerii unui punctaj mare pentru acest factor de evaluare. Neprezentarea acestor informații în cadrul propunerii tehnice va conduce la neacordarea punctajului aferent factorului de evaluare ce vizează perioada de garanție a lucrărilor suplimentar ofertată.
column4:
Warranty period for works: For tenders that present a warranty period of 60 months, the maximum score of 25 points will be awarded.
For offering a minimum warranty period of 36 months, 1 point is awarded.
Tenders with a warranty period less than 36 months are declared non‑compliant.
Intermediate points are awarded for the range between 37 months (inclusive) and 59 months (inclusive), with 1 point for each additional month.
No intermediate points are awarded for intervals shorter than 1 month.
Note 1: For offers that express the warranty period in days, or if the number of months is given as a decimal, only the whole number of months is considered. (e.g., 1,404 days = 1,404 / 30 = 46.80 months – 46 months are scored; e.g., 38.2 months – 38 months are scored).
Note 2: The bidder must demonstrate the declared warranty period by specifying the materials and technologies it will use and considers capable of ensuring the required quality.
In the technical proposal, the bidder must describe how the quality‑management plan will ensure the necessary quality level of the results and work processes, presenting the overall approach and methodology for carrying out the contract activities, including detailed descriptions of work methods for major work components and the materials to be used, so that an extended warranty is not offered merely declaratively to obtain a high score for this evaluation factor. Failure to provide this information in the technical proposal will result in no points being awarded for the evaluation factor concerning the additionally offered warranty period.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor (conform clauzei 61 din conditii generale de contract): Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor conform clauzei 61 din conditii generale de contract, Detalii privind aplicarea algoritmului de calcul
Autoritatea contractanta puncteaza, acel termen care este situat intre minimul de 61 luni si maximul de 120 luni.
Va obtine punctajul maxim garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor cu durata cea mai lunga.
Pentru alte durate se va utiliza formula:
PGTL (n) = (GTL (n) / GTL (cea mai mare ) x 25 puncte
Unde,
PGTL (n)  - punctajul ofertei pentru factorul de evaluare „Garantia tehnica acordata lucrarilor”
GTL (cea mai mare) – garantia tehnica a lucrarilor cea mai mare
GTL (n)- garantia tehnica a lucrarilor ofertata in cadrul ofertei al carei punctaj se calculeaza

Autoritatea contractată consideră un termen de garantie realist, acel termen situat între minimul de 60 luni și maximul de 120 luni. Nicio garantie care depășește 120 luni nu va fi punctată suplimentar față de punctajul maxim aferent factorului de evaluare – 25 de puncte. Termenul de garație tehnică va fi exprimat în luni.

Prezenta sectiune se completeazacu prevederile din documentatia de atribuire, Sectiunii II, Caiet de sarcini, DETALII PRIVIND CRITERIUL DE ATRIBUIRE- Factori de evaluare.
column4:
Technical guarantee provided for works (according to clause 61 of the general contract conditions): Technical guarantee provided for works according to clause 61 of the general contract conditions, details on the application of the calculation algorithm.
The contracting authority scores the term that is between a minimum of 61 months and a maximum of 120 months.
The maximum score is awarded for the technical guarantee with the longest duration.
For other durations, the following formula is used:
PGTL(n) = (GTL(n) / GTL(max)) x 25 points
Where:
PGTL(n) – the score of the offer for the evaluation factor "Technical guarantee provided for works"
GTL(max) – the highest technical guarantee among the offers
GTL(n) – the technical guarantee offered in the bid whose score is being calculated.

The contracting authority considers a realistic guarantee term to be between a minimum of 60 months and a maximum of 120 months. Any guarantee exceeding 120 months will not receive additional points beyond the maximum score for the evaluation factor – 25 points. The technical guarantee term must be expressed in months.

This section is completed with the provisions from the tender documentation, Section II, Specification, DETAILS REGARDING THE AWARD CRITERION – Evaluation Factors.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3: Realizarea unei etape de productie in regiunea de dezvoltare unde isi are sediul autoritatea contractanta: Componenta tehnica, Algoritm de calcul: - Pentru realizarea unei etape de producţie în regiunea de dezvoltare unde îşi are sediul autoritatea contractantă se acordă 30 de puncte; - Pentru realizarea unei etape de producţie în regiuni de dezvoltare în imediata vecinătate cu regi-unea de dezvoltare unde îşi are sediul autoritatea contractantă se acordă 15 puncte; - Pentru realizarea unei etape de producţie pe teritoriul României se acordă 10 puncte; - Pentru realizarea unei etape de producţie în spaţiul intracomunitar se acordă 5 puncte.
column4: Implementation of a production stage in the development region where the contracting authority is headquartered: Technical component, Calculation algorithm: - For carrying out a production stage in the development region where the contracting authority is headquartered, 30 points are awarded; - For carrying out a production stage in development regions immediately adjacent to the development region where the contracting authority is headquartered, 15 points are awarded; - For carrying out a production stage on the territory of Romania, 10 points are awarded; - For carrying out a production stage in the intra‑community area, 5 points are awarded.

column2: F. Human Rights & Ethical Trade / Supply-Chain Due Diligence (ISC-style)
column3: Lanţul de aprovizionare: Componenta tehnica, Algoritm de calcul: - Fără niciun intermediar unde sunt incluşi producători, procesatori, asociaţi de producători, respectiv organizaţii de producători, grupuri de producători, cooperative se acordă 30 de puncte; - Atunci când există un intermediar se acordă 20 puncte; - Pentru doi sau mai mulţi intermediari se acordă 10 puncte. Notă: Operatorul economic care asigură pentru ofertant serviciile de transport al produselor, accesorii furnizării, nu va fi considerat intermediar, deoarece suntem în prezenţa unei singure oferte şi a unui singur transfer al dreptului de proprietate asupra produselor, respectiv de la ofertant la autoritatea contractantă achizitoare, transportatorul în cauză facturând către ofertant doar serviciile de transport. Totodată, menţionăm, pentru buna înţelegere a modalităţii de acordare a punctajului aferent factorilor tehnici, faptul că nu se urmăreşte punctarea cantităţii de produse aduse de producător, respectiv de intermediar, ci doar existenţa sau nu a unui intermediar în lanţul de aprovizionare. Clasamentul pe baza căruia se stabileşte oferta câştigătoare se întocmeşte în ordinea de-screscătoare a punctajului total (P_total) obţinut prin însumarea punctajelor aferente factorului preţ şi a celor privind calitatea, potrivit formulei Ptotal= Pfin + PEPRD + PLA unde: Pfin = punctajul pentru factorul de evaluare „Pretul ofertei” PEPRD = punctajul alocat pentru factorul de evaluare „Realizarea unei etape de productie in regi-unea de dezvoltare unde isi are sediul autoritatea contractanta” PLA = punctajul alocat pentru factorul de evaluare „Lanţul de aprovizionare”
column4: Supply chain: Technical component, Scoring algorithm: - No intermediary present, including producers, processors, producers' associations, producers' organisations, groups of producers, cooperatives, receives 30 points; - When there is one intermediary, 20 points are awarded; - For two or more intermediaries, 10 points are awarded. Note: The economic operator providing the bidder with transport services for the products, accessories, etc., will not be considered an intermediary, because there is a single offer and a single transfer of ownership of the products from the bidder to the contracting authority, with the transporter invoicing only the transport services to the bidder. Also, for clarity on how points are awarded for technical factors, it is noted that the quantity of products supplied by the producer or intermediary is not being scored, only the presence or absence of an intermediary in the supply chain. The ranking used to determine the winning offer is compiled in descending order of the total score (P_total) obtained by adding the scores for the price factor and the quality factors, according to the formula P_total = Pfin + PEPRD + PLA where: Pfin = score for the evaluation factor "Offer price"; PEPRD = score allocated for the evaluation factor "Implementation of a production stage in the development region where the contracting authority is located"; PLA = score allocated for the evaluation factor "Supply chain".

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
TERMENUL DE LIVRARE: Se va puncta termenul ofertat pentru livrarea produselor, termen calculat ca perioada cuprinsă între data emiterii comenzii ferme de către achizitor și data livrării efective a acestora la locația de livrare convenită., Pentru oferta admisibilă cu cel mai mic termen de livrare în accepțiunea mai sus precizată, însă nu mai mic de 30 de zile se va acorda punctajul maxim, respectiv 10 puncte.

Pentru celelalte oferte admisibile, cu termene de livrare mai mari, însă nu mai mari decât 60 de zile, punctajul se va calcula după formula:

P(2) = (Termenmin/Termenn) x 10
Unde:
P(2) - Punctaj termen ofertă admisibilă punctată
Termenmin - Termenul de livrare cel mai mic acordat dintre ofertele admisibile
Termenn - Termenul de livrare al ofertei admisibile punctate
Termen minim de livrare – 30 de zile
Termen maxim de livrare – 60 de zile
Termenele de livrare se vor preciza de către ofertanți în zile calendaristice.
Pentru toate reperele se va oferta același termen de livrare.

Ofertele care se vor referi la termene de livrare mai mici de 30 zile nu vor fi punctate suplimentar.
Ofertele care se vor referi la termene de livrare egale cu termenul maxim impus prin Caietul de sarcini vor fi punctate cu 0 puncte .
Ofertele care se vor referi la termene de livrare mai mari decât cel maxim impus prin Caietul de sarcini vor fi declarate neconforme.
column4:
DELIVERY TERM: The offered delivery term for the products will be scored. The term is calculated as the period between the date the purchaser issues the firm order and the actual delivery date at the agreed delivery location. For the admissible offer with the shortest delivery term, as defined above, but not less than 30 days, the maximum score of 10 points will be awarded.

For other admissible offers with longer delivery terms, but not exceeding 60 days, the score will be calculated using the formula:

P(2) = (TermMin / TermOffer) x 10
Where:
P(2) – score for the admissible offer’s delivery term
TermMin – the shortest delivery term awarded among admissible offers
TermOffer – the delivery term of the scored admissible offer
Minimum delivery term – 30 days
Maximum delivery term – 60 days
Delivery terms must be specified by bidders in calendar days.
All items must be offered with the same delivery term.

Offers referring to delivery terms shorter than 30 days will not receive additional points.
Offers referring to delivery terms equal to the maximum term imposed by the Specification Book will be scored with 0 points.
Offers referring to delivery terms longer than the maximum term imposed by the Specification Book will be declared non‑conforming.

WARRANTY PERIOD GRANTED FOR PRODUCTS: According to the specifications, the warranty term granted for the products shall be at least 24 months. Additional points are awarded for each year of warranty and agreement regarding additional services offered beyond the minimum technical specifications as follows: a) 4 or more years of additional warranty: 20 points; b) 3 years of additional warranty: 15 points; c) 2 years of additional warranty: 10 points; d) 1 year of additional warranty: 5 points. Notes: - the granted periods shall be expressed in years, fractional periods are not allowed. - the minimum term of 24 months scores 0 points. - for warranty periods less than 24 months the offer will be declared non‑compliant. Verification: The bidder provides a self‑declaration detailing the warranty period offered and certifying that the conformity of the goods with the contract specifications, including all indicated uses, is covered.

column3:
EMISII DE FORMALDEHIDĂ PROVENITE DE LA PANOURI PE BAZĂ DE LEMN: Se acordă puncte atunci când toate panourile pe bază de lemn utilizate la mobilier se dovedesc a avea valori ale emisiilor de formaldehidă care respectă pragul-limită de 65% pentru emisiile de formaldehidă care permit încadrarea în categoria E1, conform definiției din anexa B la standardul EN 13986., a). pentru oferte care nu cuprind dovezi concrete referitoare la valoarea emisilor de formaldehidă se acordă 0 puncte.
b). pentru oferte care cuprind Dovezi concrete referitoare la valoarea emisilor de formaldehidă pentru cel puțin 75% din produsele ofertate se acordă 10 puncte.
c). pentru oferte care cuprind dovezi concrete referitoare la valoarea emisilor de formaldehidă pentru toate produsele ofertate se acordă 20 puncte.

Modalitate de îndeplinire:
a) Declarație din partea furnizorului de panouri pe bază de lemn (pentru produsele care conțin produse fabricate din material lemnos) prin care se atestă că panourile furnizate sunt conforme cu limitele de emisii E1, susținută de rapoarte de testare realizate în conformitate cu unul dintre standardele EN 717-1, EN 717-2/EN 120/EN ISO 12460-3 sau ISO 12460-59;
b) face dovada că produsele de mobilier ofertate au primit eticheta ecologică a UE pentru mobilier astfel cum s-a stabilit în Decizia (UE) 2016/1332 a Comisiei sau alte etichete ecologice ISO 14024 tipul I relevante care îndeplinesc în mod direct cerințele menționate sau care utilizează metode echivalente sunt considerate a fi conforme;

Mentiune: Produsele de mobilier care au primit eticheta ecologică a UE pentru mobilier, astfel cum s-a stabilit în Decizia (UE) 2016/1332 a Comisiei sau alte etichete ecologice ISO 14024 tipul I relevante care îndeplinesc în mod direct cerințele menționate sau care utilizează metode echivalente sau îndeplinesc condițiile de la pct. a) sunt punctate cu 20 de puncte.
column4:
FORMALDEHYDE EMISSIONS FROM WOOD-BASED PANELS: Points are awarded when all wood-based panels used in furniture are proven to have formaldehyde emission values that respect the limit threshold of 65% for emissions that allow classification in category E1, according to the definition in Annex B of standard EN 13986. a) for offers that do not include concrete evidence regarding the emission values, 0 points are awarded. b) for offers that include concrete evidence regarding the emission values for at least 75% of the offered products, 10 points are awarded. c) for offers that include concrete evidence regarding the emission values for all offered products, 20 points are awarded.

Method of compliance:
a) Supplier declaration for wood-based panels (for products containing wood material) certifying that the supplied panels comply with E1 emission limits, supported by testing reports carried out in accordance with one of the standards EN 717-1, EN 717-2/EN 120/EN ISO 12460-3 or ISO 12460-59; b) evidence that the offered furniture products have received the EU ecolabel for furniture as established in Commission Decision (EU) 2016/1332 or other relevant ISO 14024 Type I eco‑labels that directly meet the mentioned requirements or use equivalent methods are considered compliant.

Note: Furniture products that have received the EU ecolabel for furniture, as established in Commission Decision (EU) 2016/1332, or other relevant ISO 14024 Type I eco‑labels that directly meet the mentioned requirements or use equivalent methods, or meet the conditions in point a), are awarded 20 points.

column3:
AMBALAJELE: Componenta tehnica (verde) Condiție necesar a fi îndeplinită pentru acordarea punctajului de 10 pct., Se acordă puncte atunci când sunt utilizate cutii de carton, care sunt compuse din cel puțin 50% material reciclat sau pungi/folii din plastic pentru ambalarea finală care sunt compuse din cel puțin 50% material reciclat ori biodegradabile/compostabile, în conformitate cu definițiile prevăzute în EN13432.

Produsele care dețin o etichetă ecologică relevantă de tip I și care îndeplinesc criteriile enumerate sunt punctate corespunzător, respectiv 10 puncte.

În mod alternativ, se prezintă o declarație de conformitate cu prezentul criteriu privind ambalajul produsului. Criteriul vizează numai ambalajele primare, astfel cum sunt definite în Directiva 94/62/CE, modificată prin Directiva 2004/12/CE.

Verificare: Se prezintă o descriere a ambalajului produsului împreună cu o declarație pe propria răspundere a ofertantului prin care își asumă faptul că la momentul livrării produsele vor fi însoțite de documente provenite de la producător care confirmă procentul de material reciclat folosit la ambalaj.
column4:
PACKAGING: Technical component (green) A condition necessary to be met for awarding a score of 10 points. Points are awarded when cardboard boxes are used that are composed of at least 50% recycled material or plastic bags/foils for final packaging that are composed of at least 50% recycled material or biodegradable/compostable, in accordance with the definitions provided in EN13432.

Products that have a relevant Type I ecological label and meet the listed criteria are scored accordingly, i.e., 10 points.

Alternatively, a compliance statement with this packaging criterion may be presented. The criterion applies only to primary packaging, as defined in Directive 94/62/EEC, amended by Directive 2004/12/EEC.

Verification: A description of the product's packaging is presented together with a self‑declaration by the bidder stating that at the time of delivery the products will be accompanied by documents from the manufacturer confirming the percentage of recycled material used in the packaging.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Perioada de garantie acordata lucrarilor: Componenta tehnica

Cerința minimă: perioada acordată pentru garanția lucrărilor minim 60 luni(5 ani) în conformitate cu specificaţiile Legii nr. 163 din 21.07.2016 privind modificarea şi completarea Legii nr. 10 din 1995 privind calitatea în construcţii, republicată.  Autoritatea contractantă acordă punctaj pentru ofertele care prezintă o perioadă suplimentară de garanţie a lucrărilor (până la maxim 84 de luni), faţă de garanţia minim acceptată de 60 de luni.
- Pentru oferta care prevede cea mai mare perioadă de garanție acordată lucrării, de maxim 84 de luni, se acordă 15 puncte
- Perioada de garanţie suplimentară  a lucrărilor se va prezenta obligatoriu în număr de luni., Operatorii economici participanți la procedură au obligația de a preciza în cadrul ofertei tehnice perioada pe care o acordă pentru garanția tehnică a lucrării. În această perioadă deficiențele apărute, imputabile executantului, vor fi remediate de acesta pe cheltuiala sa. Avantajul pe care îl aduce pentru autoritatea contractantă utilizarea acestui factor este următorul: extinderea perioadei de garanție va crește proporțional calitatea și execuția riguroasă a lucrărilor. 

Punctajul PG- PERIOADA DE GARANTIE ACORDATA LUCRARILOR se acordă astfel: 
-Pentru o perioada de garantie ce depaseste 84 luni nu se acorda punctaj suplimentar peste punctajul maxim.
 -Pentru o perioada de garantie de 60 luni se acorda 0 puncte. 
-Pentru o perioada de garantie a executiei lucrarilor sub 60 luni, oferta va fi considerata neconforma, implicit respinsa. 
-Pentru oferte care includ perioade de garantie acordate lucrarilor (PG) mai mici decat perioada de garantie maxima PGmax, se acorda punctaj conform formulei: PtCn= PGn / PGmax X 15 
Unde: 
-PtCn=punctajul obtinut de oferta n 
-PGmax=cea mai mare perioada de garantie acordata lucrarilor (maxim 84 luni)
 -PGn=perioada de garantie acordata lucrarilor aferenta ofertei n.
column4:
Warranty period granted for works: Technical component

Minimum requirement: the period granted for the works' warranty must be at least 60 months (5 years) in accordance with the specifications of Law no. 163 of 21.07.2016 amending and completing Law no. 10 of 1995 regarding quality in construction, republished. The contracting authority awards points for offers that present an additional warranty period for the works (up to a maximum of 84 months), compared to the minimum accepted warranty of 60 months.
- For the offer that provides the longest warranty period for the work, up to a maximum of 84 months, 15 points are awarded.
- The additional warranty period for the works must be presented obligatorily in number of months. Economic operators participating in the procedure are obliged to specify in the technical offer the period they grant for the technical warranty of the work. During this period, deficiencies that arise and are attributable to the contractor shall be remedied by the contractor at its own expense. The advantage for the contracting authority of using this factor is the following: extending the warranty period will proportionally increase the quality and rigorous execution of the works.

The PG – WARRANTY PERIOD GRANTED FOR WORKS score is awarded as follows:
- For a warranty period exceeding 84 months no additional points are awarded beyond the maximum score.
- For a warranty period of 60 months 0 points are awarded.
- For a warranty period of execution of works below 60 months, the offer will be considered non‑conforming, implicitly rejected.
- For offers that include warranty periods granted for the works (PG) lower than the maximum warranty period PGmax, points are awarded according to the formula: PtCn = PGn / PGmax × 15
Where:
- PtCn = points obtained by offer n
- PGmax = the highest warranty period granted for the works (maximum 84 months)
- PGn = warranty period granted for the works corresponding to offer n.

column3: factorul tehnic 1 „Experiența ptofesionala” – cu o pondere de 24%, pentru care se acordă un punctaj maxim de 24 de puncte:    subfactorul tehnic 1.1.: Expert-cheie 1 – Manager de contract/Reprezentant al Antreprenorului, pentru care se acordă un punctaj maxim de 6 puncte;    subfactorul tehnic 1.2.: Expert-cheie 2 – Arhitect - arhitect cu drept de semnătură conform Legii nr. 184/2001, pentru care se acordă un punctaj maxim de 6 puncte;    subfactorul tehnic 1.3.: Expert-cheie 3 – Inginer proiectant pentru specialitatea structură, pentru care se acordă un punctaj maxim de 6 puncte;    subfactorul tehnic 1.4.: Expert-cheie 4 – Inginer proiectant pentru specialitatea instalații HVAC, pentru care se acordă un punctaj maxim de 6 puncte., In caz de neconcordante intre prevederile caietului de sarcini si cele ale Fisei de date, prevaleaza prevederile Caietului de sarcini. Metodologia de calcul pentru fiecare subfactor se afla la „Factori de evluare” se regasesc in C.S. Sectiunea 1, parte a documentatiei de atribuire.
column4: Technical factor 1 "Professional experience" – with a weight of 24%, for which a maximum score of 24 points is awarded: • technical sub‑factor 1.1: Key expert 1 – Contract manager / Representative of the Contractor, for which a maximum of 6 points is awarded; • technical sub‑factor 1.2: Key expert 2 – Architect – architect with signing authority according to Law no. 184/2001, for which a maximum of 6 points is awarded; • technical sub‑factor 1.3: Key expert 3 – Design engineer for the structural specialty, for which a maximum of 6 points is awarded; • technical sub‑factor 1.4: Key expert 4 – Design engineer for the HVAC installations specialty, for which a maximum of 6 points is awarded. In case of inconsistencies between the provisions of the terms of reference and those of the data sheet, the provisions of the terms of reference prevail. The calculation methodology for each sub‑factor is found in the "Evaluation Factors" located in the C.S. Section 1, part of the tender documentation.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated points are awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the points P(n) are calculated proportionally, as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated points.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, Points are awarded as follows: a) For the lowest of the prices, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

2.6 Key expert 6: Electrical installation design engineer – Technical component:
Electrical installation design engineer (for involvement as an Electrical Installation Design Engineer in similar projects at any design stage in accordance with the provisions of HG 907/2016 for construction/modernisation/rehabilitation/extension of hospital units) – maximum 10 points.
- For experience consisting of involvement as an Electrical Installation Design Engineer in the preparation of technical‑economic documentation at any design stage according to HG 907/2016 in 5 or more projects/contracts for construction/modernisation/rehabilitation/extension of hospital units, the proposed person receives 10 points.
- For experience consisting of involvement as an Electrical Installation Design Engineer in the preparation of technical‑economic documentation at any design stage according to HG 907/2016 in 3 or 4 projects/contracts for construction/modernisation/rehabilitation/extension of hospital units, the proposed person receives 5 points.
- For experience consisting of involvement as an Electrical Installation Design Engineer in the preparation of technical‑economic documentation at any design stage according to HG 907/2016 in 2 or fewer projects/contracts for construction/modernisation/rehabilitation/extension of hospital units, the proposed person receives 0 points.

Technical score (Ptehnic) = P1 + P2 + P3 + P4 + P5 + P6.

Note: For the evaluation factor concerning the project team’s experience, bidders shall submit signed handwritten CVs detailing, for each project participated in, the period allocated. To be considered in the evaluation, the CV must be accompanied, without limitation, by diplomas/certificates, valid identifications, copies of service contracts, service + works contracts, hand‑over/receipt minutes of technical documentation, signature sheets, recommendations, appointment decisions (for the project manager), and any other relevant documents.

The contracting authority reserves the right to directly verify with the issuers the truthfulness of the information contained therein.

Final score calculation = Financial score (Pfinanciar) + Technical score (Ptehnic).
To award points for the technical component, Form No.16 – Sheet containing information regarding the award criterion of best price‑quality ratio must be completed.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as follows: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Experiența   profesională specifică – MANAGER DE PROIECT: Componentă tehnică 1, Participarea expertului propus în poziția de Manager de Proiect în cadrul unor contracte de proiectare și execuție lucrări de construire/ reabilitare/ modernizare/ extindere aferente unor construcții civile care se încadrează cel puțin în categoria de importanță C, în conformitate cu prevederile Hotărârii Guvernului nr. 766/1997, similare din punct de vedere al complexității celor care fac obiectul prezentului contract, se va puncta astfel:
•   Pentru implicarea ca manager de proiect în 2-3 contracte de proiectare și execuție lucrări- se va acorda punctaj maxim 5 puncte.
•   Pentru implicarea ca manager de proiect în 4-5 contracte de proiectare și execuție lucrări- se va acorda punctaj maxim 7 puncte.
•   Pentru implicarea ca manager de proiect în minim 6 contracte de proiectare și execuție lucrări- se va acorda punctaj maxim 10 puncte.
Punctajul maxim se acordă pentru oferta prin care se prezintă minim 6 contracte prin care se demonstrează experiența deținută de Managerul de Proiect (conform descrierii de mai sus). Documentele prin care se probează punctajul vor fi: CV- cu indicarea clară a contractelor care se vor considera experiența personalului propus, recomandări / procese verbale/ alte documente care atestă experiența declarată la nivelul CV-ului.
Pentru participarea în calitate de Manager de proiect în minim 1 (un) contract de proiectare și execuție lucrări, nu se acordă punctaj, fiind cerință minimă prevăzută în caietul de sarcini. Sub acest nivel considerat minimal oferta va fi declarată neconformă.
column4:
Specific professional experience – PROJECT MANAGER: Technical component 1, Participation of the proposed expert in the position of Project Manager within design and execution contracts for construction/rehabilitation/modernisation/extension works related to civil constructions that are at least in category C importance, in accordance with Government Decision No. 766/1997, similar in terms of complexity to those covered by the present contract, will be scored as follows:
• For involvement as project manager in 2‑3 design and execution contracts – a maximum of 5 points will be awarded.
• For involvement as project manager in 4‑5 design and execution contracts – a maximum of 7 points will be awarded.
• For involvement as project manager in at least 6 design and execution contracts – a maximum of 10 points will be awarded.
The maximum score is granted to the offer that presents at least 6 contracts that demonstrate the Project Manager’s experience (as described above). The documents proving the score will be: CV clearly indicating the contracts considered as the experience of the proposed personnel, recommendations / minutes / other documents certifying the declared experience at the CV level.
Participation as Project Manager in at least 1 (one) design and execution contract does not receive points, being a minimum requirement set out in the specifications. Offers below this minimal level will be declared non‑conforming.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the scoring is awarded as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

Extended guarantee of works: Evaluation factor: "Extended guarantee of works" – weight 20%, maximum score 10 points.
The score for the evaluation factor "Extended guarantee of works", with a value of 10 points out of a total of 100 points and a weight of 10% of the total award criteria, will be awarded as follows:
The extension of the warranty period for the works is done by adding a number of months to the minimum warranty period, which, according to Law no. 10/1995, is at least 60 months for Category B importance construction. The technical warranty term offered in months will be scored, ranging between a minimum of 61 months and a maximum of 96 months. Any technical warranty term offered below the minimum of 60 months will result in the bid being rejected as non‑conforming. For a technical warranty term of exactly 60 months, the bid will be declared conforming and awarded the minimum system score of 0.01 points. The highest offered warranty period will receive the maximum allocated score (10 points). For other offered values, the score is calculated proportionally as:
Go(n) = (Gn / Gmax offered) × 10,
where:
  Go(n) – score of the analyzed bid;
  Gn – warranty period in the analyzed bid (expressed in months);
  Gmax offered – the largest warranty period offered (expressed in months).
To avoid a purely declarative approach, bidders must, within their technical proposal, provide a description justifying the additional/extended warranty. This description should present the qualitative advantages of the works to be performed (quality and durability of materials, advanced technologies used, etc.), explaining the granted warranty, how the quality management plan will ensure the required level of result and process quality, by presenting the necessary approach and methodology for carrying out the contract activities (execution of works), including detailed descriptions of work methods for major work components and the materials to be installed, so that the offering of an extended warranty can be demonstrated. The benefit obtained by the beneficiary from a warranty period exceeding the minimum requested should be preserved during contract implementation.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.

column8:
Supply chain: Medium criterion
Imposing this criterion guarantees the superiority and reliability of the delivered products by involving the smallest possible number of intermediaries in product delivery. Calculation algorithm:
- Offers presented by manufacturers are awarded 40 points;
- Offers that propose a single intermediary in the supply chain receive 20 points;
- Offers that propose two intermediaries in the supply chain receive 10 points;
- Offers proposing more than two intermediaries in the supply chain will not be scored.
Scoring of this evaluation factor applies only if the bidder provides supporting documents for each product.
Calculation formula:
PLO = (PL1 + PL2 + ... + PLp) / p, where
PLO = bidder's supply‑chain score,
PL1, PL2, …, PLp = supply‑chain score for each product,
 p = total number of products.
column9:
Lanțul de aprovizionare: Criteriu mediu
Impunerea acestui criteriu garantează superioritatea şi fiabilitatea produselor livrate, prin implicarea unui număr cît mai redus de intermediari în livrarea produselor., Algoritm de calcul: 
- se vor puncta cu 40 puncte, pentru ofertele prezentate de către producători;
Se vor acorda 20 puncte pentru ofertele prezentate care propun un singur intermediar în lanțul de aprovizionare
Se vor acorda 10 puncte ofertele pentru ofertele prezentate care propun doi intermediari în lanțul de aprovizionare
Ofertele care propun mai mult de doi intermediari implicați în lanțul de aprovizionare nu vor fi punctate. 
Punctarea acestui factor de evaluare se aplică numai dacă ofertantul prezintă documente justificative pentru fiecare produs
Formula de calcul este
PLO = (PL1+PL2+..+PLp) /p, unde
PLO = punctaj lant aprovizionare ofertant
PL1, PL2, PLp – punctaj lanț de aprovizionare pentru fiecare produs
p - numărul total de produse

column3:
Utilizarea de ambalaje refolosibile: Criteriu mediu
Impunerea acestui criteriu garantează că în procesul de aprovizionare sunt folosite ambalaje refolosibile (ambalaje secundare și/sau de transport), Se vor acorda 20 puncte pentru ofertele prezentate care propun livrarea de produse alimentare în ambalaje secundare și/sau de transport cu conținut reciclat în proporție de peste 45%. 
Se vor acorda 10 puncte ofertele pentru ofertele prezentate care propun livrarea de produse alimentare în ambalaje secundare și/sau de transport cu conținut reciclat în proporție cuprins între 25 și 45%.
Ofertele care propun livrarea de produse alimentare în ambalaje secundare și/sau de transport cu conținut reciclat în proporție mai mică de 25  vor fi punctate cu 0 puncte. 
Punctarea acestui factor de evaluare se aplică numai dacă ofertantul prezintă documente justificative pentru fiecare produs
Formula de calcul este
ARO = (AR1+AR2+..+ARp) /p, unde
ARO = punctaj ambalaje refolosibile ofertant
AR1, AR2, ARp – punctaj ambalaje refolosibile pentru fiecare produs
p - numărul total de produse.
column10:
Use of reusable packaging: Medium criterion
The imposition of this criterion ensures that reusable packaging (secondary and/or transport packaging) is used in the procurement process. 20 points will be awarded for offers that propose the delivery of food products in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content exceeding 45%.
10 points will be awarded for offers that propose the delivery of food products in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content between 25% and 45%.
Offers that propose the delivery of food products in secondary and/or transport packaging with recycled content less than 25% will receive 0 points.
The scoring of this evaluation factor applies only if the bidder provides supporting documents for each product.
The calculation formula is:
ARO = (AR1+AR2+..+ARp) / p, where
ARO = bidder's reusable packaging score
AR1, AR2, ARp – reusable packaging score for each product
p – total number of products.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3: Punctaj tehnic: TERMEN DE GARANȚIE, Pentru 2 ani de garanție se acordă 0 puncte Pentru 3 ani de garanție se acordă 20 puncte Pentru 4 ani de garanție se acordă 35 puncte
column4: Technical score: WARRANTY TERM, For 2 years of warranty 0 points are awarded; for 3 years of warranty 20 points are awarded; for 4 years of warranty 35 points are awarded.

column3: Punctaj tehnic: AMBALAJ RECICLARE, Pentru un echipament cu ambalaj de reciclare <=50% din echipament se acordă 0 puncte Pentru un echipament cu ambalaj de reciclare > 50% din echipament se acordă 5 puncte
column4: Technical score: RECYCLING PACKAGING. For equipment with recycling packaging ≤ 50% of the equipment, 0 points are awarded. For equipment with recycling packaging > 50% of the equipment, 5 points are awarded.

column3: Punctaj tehnic: CONSUM ELECTRIC 24h, Pentru echipamentul cu cea mai bună performanță energetică, dintre toate ofertele conforme se acordă punctajului maxim alocat de 15 puncte, pentru celelalte oferte, în funcție de datele înscrise în rapoartele de testare punctajul se calculează proporțional: PE= (consum energie electrică minim/ consum energie electrică n)* punctaj maxim alocat. Consum minim de energie electrică = oferta cu cea mai bună performantă energetică a echipamentului, Consum minim de energie electrică n = performanța energetică a ofertei admisibile (echipamentului) (n) aflată sub evaluare. În ceea ce privește scenariul zilnic de utilizare al echipamentului se va cuantifica consumul zilnic de energie electrică al aparatului E (kWh/zi), pentru un scenariu de funcționare care implică 8h/zi în mod activ și 16h/zi în mod oprit. Pentru stabilirea consumului de energie (E) într-o zi, în scenariul de funcționare dat, operatorii economici vor prezenta în cadrul propunerii tehnice un tabel de calcul al consumurilor de energie: mod de funcționare: activ-oprit, T= număr de ore de funcționare în modul curent pe zi, T1= numărul de ore de functionare în modul activ, T2=numărul de ore de functionare în modul oprit, P= putere (kW), P1= putere in modul de funcționare activ, P2= puterea în modul de functionare oprit. Consumul de energie: (T1*P1) + (T2*P2) = E (kWh) pe zi.
column4: Technical score: ELECTRIC CONSUMPTION 24h, For the equipment with the best energy performance, among all compliant offers the maximum allocated score of 15 points is awarded; for the other offers, the score is calculated proportionally based on the data recorded in the testing reports: PE = (minimum electric energy consumption / electric energy consumption n) * maximum allocated score. Minimum electric energy consumption = the offer with the best energy performance of the equipment, electric energy consumption n = the energy performance of the admissible offer (equipment) (n) under evaluation. Regarding the daily usage scenario of the equipment, the daily electric energy consumption of the device E (kWh/day) shall be quantified for an operating scenario that involves 8 h/day in active mode and 16 h/day in stopped mode. To determine the energy consumption (E) in one day, in the given operating scenario, economic operators shall present in the technical proposal a calculation table of energy consumptions: operating mode: active‑stopped, T = number of operating hours in the current mode per day, T1 = number of hours operating in active mode, T2 = number of hours operating in stopped mode, P = power (kW), P1 = power in active operating mode, P2 = power in stopped operating mode. Energy consumption: (T1*P1) + (T2*P2) = E (kWh) per day.

column3: Punctaj tehnic: INSTRUCTAJ PENTRU OPTIMIZAREA EFICIENȚEI ENERGETICE, Pentru echipamentul cu cea mai bună performanță energetică, dintre toate ofertele conforme se acordă punctajului maxim alocat de 15 puncte, pentru celelalte oferte, în funcție de datele înscrise în rapoartele de testare punctajul se calculează proporțional: PE= (consum energie electrică minim/ consum energie electrică n)* punctaj maxim alocat. Consum minim de energie electrică = oferta cu cea mai bună performantă energetică a echipamentului, Consum minim de energie electrică n = performanța energetică a ofertei admisibile (echipamentului) (n) aflată sub evaluare. În ceea ce privește scenariul zilnic de utilizare al echipamentului se va cuantifica consumul zilnic de energie electrică al aparatului E (kWh/zi), pentru un scenariu de funcționare care implică 8h/zi în mod activ și 16h/zi în mod oprit. Pentru stabilirea consumului de energie (E) într-o zi, în scenariul de funcționare dat, operatorii economici vor prezenta în cadrul propunerii tehnice un tabel de calcul al consumurilor de energie: mod de funcționare: activ-oprit, T= număr de ore de funcționare în modul curent pe zi, T1= numărul de ore de functionare în modul activ, T2=numărul de ore de functionare în modul oprit, P= putere (kW), P1= putere in modul de funcționare activ, P2= puterea în modul de functionare oprit. Consumul de energie: (T1*P1) + (T2*P2) = E (kWh) pe zi.
column4: Technical score: INSTRUCTION FOR ENERGY EFFICIENCY OPTIMIZATION. For the equipment with the best energy performance, among all compliant offers, the maximum allocated score of 15 points is awarded; for the other offers, the score is calculated proportionally based on the data entered in the testing reports: PE = (minimum electric energy consumption / electric energy consumption n) * maximum allocated score. Minimum electric energy consumption = the offer with the best energy performance of the equipment. Minimum electric energy consumption n = the energy performance of the admissible offer (equipment) (n) under evaluation. Regarding the daily usage scenario of the equipment, the daily electricity consumption of the device E (kWh/day) will be quantified for an operating scenario involving 8 h/day active and 16 h/day off. To determine the energy consumption (E) in one day, in the given operating scenario, economic operators will present within the technical proposal a calculation table of energy consumptions: operating mode: active-off, T = number of operating hours in the current mode per day, T1 = number of hours operating in active mode, T2 = number of hours operating in off mode, P = power (kW), P1 = power in active operating mode, P2 = power in off operating mode. Energy consumption: (T1*P1) + (T2*P2) = E (kWh) per day.

column3:
Lanțul de aprovizionare: Prin „lanţul de aprovizionare“ se înţelege circuitul de aprovizionare care implică un număr de operatori economici responsabili de producerea, fabricarea şi comercializarea produselor care fac obiectul achiziţiei publice care are ca obiect produse agroalimentare., a)   Direct producator, include si situatia in care operatorul economic este producator pentru minim 70% din produsele care compun lotul pentru care se depune oferta  - 30 puncte
b)   Primul intermediar, include si situatia in care operatorul economic este primul intermediar pentru minim 70% din produsele care compun lotul - 20 puncte
c)   Al doilea intermediar pana la maxim 3 intermediari - 10 puncte (aici intrand si aprovizionarea de la retail-uri)
d)   Pentru mai mult de 4 intermediari se acorda 0 puncte
column4:
Supply chain: By “supply chain” is meant the supply circuit that involves a number of economic operators responsible for the production, manufacturing and marketing of the products that are the object of the public procurement, which concerns agri‑food products. a) Direct producer, also includes the situation where the economic operator is the producer for at least 70% of the products that make up the lot for which the offer is submitted – 30 points.
b) First intermediary, also includes the situation where the economic operator is the first intermediary for at least 70% of the products that make up the lot – 20 points.
c) Second intermediary up to a maximum of 3 intermediaries – 10 points (including procurement from retail).
d) For more than 4 intermediaries, 0 points are awarded.

column3:
Utilizarea vehiculelor comerciale cu emisii reduse de poluanti: Utilizarea vehiculelor comerciale cu emisii reduse de poluanti, a)   Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor electrice – 10  puncte
b)   Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor plugg- in hybrid – 7.5  puncte
c)   Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor hybrid – 5  puncte

Daca transportul produselor se realizeaza cu alte mijloace de transport decat cele mentionate mai sus, nu se acorda punctaj.

Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest among the prices, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) × maximum allocated score.

column3:
Utilizarea vehiculelor comerciale cu emisii reduse de poluanti: Utilizarea vehiculelor comerciale cu emisii reduse de poluantil, Se vor acorda urmatoarele punctaje:
a)    Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor electrice – 10  puncte
b)   Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor plugg- in hybrid – 7.5  puncte
c)   Operatorilor economici care demonstreaza folosirea vehiculelor hybrid – 5  puncte
column4:
Use of commercial vehicles with reduced pollutant emissions: Use of commercial vehicles with reduced pollutant emissions, the following points will be awarded:
a)    Economic operators who demonstrate the use of electric vehicles – 10 points
b)   Economic operators who demonstrate the use of plug‑in hybrid vehicles – 7.5 points
c)   Economic operators who demonstrate the use of hybrid vehicles – 5 points

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the scoring is assigned as follows: a) The lowest price receives the maximum allocated score; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally, as follows: P(n) = (Lowest offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

column3: Lanţul de aprovizionare (LA): Componenta calitativa, Algoritm de calcul: Algoritm de calcul: Deoarece spatiul dedicat acestei sectiuni permite un numar limitat de caractere, modalitatea completa de acordare a punctajului precum si explicitari pentru fiecare situatie posibila se regasesc in caietul de sarcini la pct. 5 - Informatii privind criteriul de atribuire.
column4: Supply chain (LA): Qualitative component, Calculation algorithm: Calculation algorithm: Because the space allocated to this section allows a limited number of characters, the full method of awarding points as well as explanations for each possible situation are found in the specifications at point 5 - Information regarding the award criterion.

column4: Use of commercial vehicles with reduced pollutant emissions: Use of commercial vehicles with reduced pollutant emissions, the following points will be awarded: a) Economic operators who demonstrate the use of electric vehicles – 10 points b) Economic operators who demonstrate the use of plug‑in hybrid vehicles – 7.5 points c) Economic operators who demonstrate the use of hybrid vehicles – 5 points.

column3: Pretul ofertei: Componenta financiara, Punctajul se acorda astfel: a) Pentru cel mai scazut dintre preturi se acorda punctajul maxim alocat; b) Pentru celelalte preturi ofertate punctajul P(n) se calculeaza proportional, astfel: P(n) = (Pret minim ofertat / Pret n) x punctaj maxim alocat.
column4: Offer price: Financial component, the score is awarded as follows: a) For the lowest price among the offers, the maximum allocated score is awarded; b) For the other offered prices, the score P(n) is calculated proportionally as: P(n) = (Minimum offered price / Price n) x maximum allocated score.

column3: Lanțul de aprovizionare: Prin „lanţul de aprovizionare“ se înţelege circuitul de aprovizionare care implică un număr de operatori economici responsabili de producerea, fabricarea şi comercializarea produselor care fac obiectul achiziţiei publice care are ca obiect produse agroalimentare, a) Direct producator, include si situatia in care operatorul economic este producator pentru minim 70% din produsele care compun lotul pentru care se depune oferta - 30 puncte b) Primul intermediar, include si situatia in care operatorul economic este primul intermediar pentru minim 70% din produsele care compun lotul - 20 puncte c) Al doilea intermediar pana la maxim 3 intermedari - 10 puncte (aici intrand si aprovizionarea de la retail-uri) d) Pentru mai mult de 4 intermedari se acorda 0 puncte
column4: Supply chain: By “supply chain” is understood the supply circuit involving a number of economic operators responsible for the production, manufacturing and marketing of the products that are the subject of the public procurement which concerns agri-food products. a) Direct producer, also includes the situation where the economic operator is the producer for at least 70% of the products that make up the lot for which the offer is submitted – 30 points. b) First intermediary, also includes the situation where the economic operator is the first intermediary for at least 70% of the products that make up the lot – 20 points. c) Second intermediary up to a maximum of 3 intermediaries – 10 points (including procurement from retailers). d) For more than 4 intermediaries, 0 points are awarded.

column3:
Caracteristici de performanta sistem de rezonanta magnetica: Componenta tehnica, Se puncteaza caracteristicile de performanta ale sistemului de rezonanta magnetica , conform Capitolului XVIII din caietul de sarcini. cele 6 criterii sunt:
1.Omogenitatea minim specificata (valoare garantata) a campului magnetic, pentru un volum sferic cu diametrul de 30 cm: ≤ 0.20 ppm - punctaj maxim = 8 puncte
2.Viteza de reconstructie a imaginilor 2D (matrice de 256x256, 100% FOV) de minim 55000 recon/s - punctaj maxim = 10 puncte
3.Secventele de difuzie sa aiba posibilitatea setarii a minim 16 valori pentru coeficientul b pentru harta ADC - punctaj maxim = 10 puncte
4.Secventa 3D dedicata care sa reduca artefactele cauzate de implanturile metalice compatibile RM - punctaj maxim = 8 puncte
5.Performanta energetica a echipamentului - punctaj maxim = 10 puncte
6.Instructaj pentru optimizarea eficientei energetice - punctaj maxim = 14puncte
column4:
Performance characteristics of magnetic resonance imaging system: Technical component, the performance characteristics of the MRI system are scored, according to Chapter XVIII of the specifications. The six criteria are:
1. Minimum specified homogeneity (guaranteed value) of the magnetic field, for a spherical volume with a diameter of 30 cm: ≤ 0.20 ppm – maximum score = 8 points.
2. Speed of reconstruction of 2D images (matrix 256x256, 100% FOV) of at least 55,000 recon/s – maximum score = 10 points.
3. Diffusion sequences must allow setting at least 16 values for the b‑coefficient for the ADC map – maximum score = 10 points.
4. Dedicated 3D sequence that reduces artifacts caused by MRI‑compatible metal implants – maximum score = 8 points.
5. Energy performance of the equipment – maximum score = 10 points.
6. Training for optimizing energy efficiency – maximum score = 14 points.
